original: rang rang gi rigs la ltos pa dang / tha dad pa'i rigs la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: rang rang gi rigs la ltos pa dang / tha dad pa'i rigs la ltos pa'o //
translated: in relation to their own type, and in relation to a different type.

original: de la yang rang gi rigs la ltos pa ni ji ltar rdo rje bzlas pa rnam pa bcu ma ning gi bzlas pa gcig pu la 'dus so //
analyzed: de la yang rang gi rigs la ltos pa ni ji ltar rdo rje bzlas pa rnam pa bcu ma ning gi bzlas pa gcig pu la 'dus so //
translated: Therein, in relation to their own type, just as the ten aspects of vajra repetition are included in the single neutral repetition.

original: de bas na de ni le'u bcu gsum pa las tha mar bstan to //
analyzed: de bas na de ni le'u bcu gsum pa las tha mar bstan to //
translated: Therefore, it is taught at the end of the thirteenth chapter.

original: snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum po ni 'od gsal ba la'o //
analyzed: snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum po ni 'od gsal ba la'o //
translated: The three wisdoms of appearance and so forth are in clear light.

original: chos kyi sku la sogs pa ye she kyi sku la'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku la sogs pa ye she kyi sku la'o //
translated: The dharmakƒÅya and so forth are in the wisdom kƒÅya.

original: 'dod chags dang 'dod chags bral ba dang 'dod chags bar ma 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid la'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang 'dod chags bral ba dang 'dod chags bar ma 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid la'o //
translated: Attachment, freedom from attachment, and middling attachment are in the reality of clear light.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'dus par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'dus par 'gyur ro//
translated: Cause and effect are included in the union meditative stabilization.

original: rigs tha dad pa la ltos pa ni ji ltar rim pa thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor gnas te /
analyzed: rigs tha dad pa la ltos pa ni ji ltar rim pa thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor gnas te /
translated: In relation to a different type, just as all the stages abide in the nature of cause and effect.

original: de la rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa rim pa bzhi po ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: de la rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa rim pa bzhi po ni rgyu'o //
translated: Therein, the four stages of vajra repetition and so forth are the cause.

original: zung du 'jug pa rim pa 'bras bu yin pas rim pa bzhi po ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa lnga pa la 'dus te /üîΩbya ba byas pa dang / de @83a * //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa rim pa 'bras bu yin pas rim pa bzhi po ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa lnga pa la 'dus te / bya ba byas pa dang / de @83a * //
translated: The stage of union is the resultant stage, so the four stages are included in the fifth stage, the stage of union.

original: las gzhan pa mi slob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las gzhan pa mi slob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the former is the performance of action and the latter is the non-learner.

original: de ltar rim pa lnga po de dag gi dbye ba dang bsdu ba gang gis shes pa des rgyud ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rnams rig cing shes so zhes tshig gi don to //
analyzed: de ltar rim pa lnga po de dag gi dbye ba dang bsdu ba gang gis shes pa des rgyud ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rnams rig cing shes so zhes tshig gi don to //
translated: Thus, one who knows the divisions and the inclusion of these five stages knows the tantras, the great yoga tantras. This is the meaning of the words.

original: tshigs gi don gcig pu tsam bshad pa la mkhas pas shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshigs gi don gcig pu tsam bshad pa la mkhas pas shes pa ma yin no //
translated: One who is skilled in explaining only the individual words does not know.

original: da ni rim pa lnga'i bsdus pa'i don shes pas mtha' drug gi 'grel pa 'di la snod du rung bar 'gyur zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rim pa lnga'i bsdus pa'i don shes pas mtha' drug gi 'grel pa 'di la snod du rung bar 'gyur zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach that one who knows the meaning of the inclusion of the five stages becomes a suitable vessel for this commentary on the six limits,

original: sngags dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: sngags dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: he says ‚Äúmantra and mantra‚Äù and so on.

original: de la sngags dang sngags ni sngags so //
analyzed: de la sngags dang sngags ni sngags so //
translated: Therein, mantra and mantra is mantra.

original: gcig ni lhag ma'i bsdu ba byas nas sngags kyi sgra gnyis gzung ngo ;
analyzed: gcig ni lhag ma'i bsdu ba byas nas sngags kyi sgra gnyis gzung ngo ;
translated: Having made the inclusion of the remainder, the two terms mantra are taken.

original: / de la sngags kyi sgra dang pos ni dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis rdzogs pa'i sngags kyi sku brjod pa'o //
analyzed: / de la sngags kyi sgra dang pos ni dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis rdzogs pa'i sngags kyi sku brjod pa'o //
translated: The first sound of the mantra expresses the mantra body perfected by the three samadhis, beginning with the initial union.

original: gnyis pas kyang sngags thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa yi ge gsum po 'jug pa la sogs pa gtsor gyur pa rjod par byed do //
analyzed: gnyis pas kyang sngags thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa yi ge gsum po 'jug pa la sogs pa gtsor gyur pa rjod par byed do //
translated: The second expresses the three syllables, which are the essence of all mantras, and which are the principal ones in the process of entry and so forth.

original: de'i rjes su ye shes dang rnam shes dang rang bzhin thams cad 'gog pas sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas rdzogs pa sems rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid so sor bstan pa'i rim pa ni sems so //
analyzed: de'i rjes su ye shes dang rnam shes dang rang bzhin thams cad 'gog pas sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas rdzogs pa sems rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid so sor bstan pa'i rim pa ni sems so //
translated: After that, the mind is the stage of teaching the individual purities of the mind, which are perfected by the stages of mantra and seal, by stopping all the wisdoms, consciousnesses, and natures.

original: de la rnam par dag pa'i tshig mi mngon par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la rnam par dag pa'i tshig mi mngon par shes par bya'o //
translated: There, the words purity should be understood to be not expressed.

original: de'i rjes su grib ma dang / sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon la sogs pa sgyu ma'i dpe rnams kyis mtshon pa ye shes kyi sku ston par byed pa ni lus so //
analyzed: de'i rjes su grib ma dang / sgyu ma dang 'ja' tshon la sogs pa sgyu ma'i dpe rnams kyis mtshon pa ye shes kyi sku ston par byed pa ni lus so //
translated: After that, the body is the teaching of the wisdom body, which is illustrated by the examples of illusion, such as a shadow, a mirage, and a rainbow, and so forth.

original: sgyu ma'i lus po de la yang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa bsgom pa'i dbang gis nye bar zhi bas 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rim pa ston par byed pa ni rnam dag go //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i lus po de la yang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa bsgom pa'i dbang gis nye bar zhi bas 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rim pa ston par byed pa ni rnam dag go //
translated: The pure is the teaching of the process of the character of entry into clear light by the pacification of the illusory body through the power of meditation on the stages of the seal and samadhi.

original: sngar bshad pa'i kun rdzob dang don dam pa la sogs pa gnyis su 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rim pa so sor bstan pa ni zung du 'jug go //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i kun rdzob dang don dam pa la sogs pa gnyis su 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rim pa so sor bstan pa ni zung du 'jug go //
translated: The union is the teaching of the process of the character of the manifestation of the conception of the duality of the conventional and the ultimate, etc., as previously explained.

original: de dag la brten te rkyen dang ldan pa'i sgra phye bas las kyi don du 'am rgyu lnga pa la bya'o //
analyzed: de dag la brten te rkyen dang ldan pa'i sgra phye bas las kyi don du 'am rgyu lnga pa la bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the word is the division of the words which are the conditions based on those.

original: rim pa lnga'i bsdus pa'i don ni de dag skabs kyi rim pa'i rigs pas bsdus pa'i don rnams shes nas ni rtogs nas so //
analyzed: rim pa lnga'i bsdus pa'i don ni de dag skabs kyi rim pa'i rigs pas bsdus pa'i don rnams shes nas ni rtogs nas so //
translated: The meaning of the collection is the meaning of the collection of those topics by the logic of the process in that context.

original: ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci bya zhe na /
translated: What is to be done?

original: mtha' drug la 'jug go zhes smos te don drug so sor bstan pa'i 'grel pa 'di la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: mtha' drug la 'jug go zhes smos te don drug so sor bstan pa'i 'grel pa 'di la 'jug par bya ste /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúOne should enter into the six limits.‚Äù One should enter into this commentary which teaches the six topics individually.

original: de mnyan pa'am bshad pa la snod du rung bar 'gyur @83b zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de mnyan pa'am bshad pa la snod du rung bar 'gyur @83b zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one becomes a suitable vessel for listening to or explaining that.

original: ji ltar mtha' drug gi 'grel pa'i rim pa lnga brjod par bya ba de bzhin du sngon du bshad zin pa dang 'chad par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar mtha' drug gi 'grel pa'i rim pa lnga brjod par bya ba de bzhin du sngon du bshad zin pa dang 'chad par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the five stages of the commentary on the six parameters are to be explained, so also what has been explained before and what will be explained.

original: da ni gang la brten te 'grel ba byas pa de nyid yi ge gsum po ston par byed pa dpal gsang ba 'dus pa nyid bsngags par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gang la brten te 'grel ba byas pa de nyid yi ge gsum po ston par byed pa dpal gsang ba 'dus pa nyid bsngags par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to praise the glorious Guhyasamaja itself, which is the revealer of the three syllables, in dependence on which the commentary is composed,

original: ji srid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la yang /
analyzed: ji srid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la yang /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúAs long as there are‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on.

original: ral wa la sogs pa gsal bar bya ba rnams dang / gang med par mi 'byung ba dbyangs kyi sde ji srid yod pa de rnams /
analyzed: ral wa la sogs pa gsal bar bya ba rnams dang / gang med par mi 'byung ba dbyangs kyi sde ji srid yod pa de rnams /
translated: The meaning is that as long as there are the manifest syllables such as ra, la, and so on, and the melody set that does not occur without them,

original: de de'i rtsa ba yi ge gsum las de rnams 'byung zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de de'i rtsa ba yi ge gsum las de rnams 'byung zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: they are the root of that, and they arise from the three syllables.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te lte pa'i phyogs nas langs pa'i srog gi rlung gis gnas brgyad dang phrad pa las dbyangs dang gsal ba'i bye brag gis sde tshan brgyad skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te lte pa'i phyogs nas langs pa'i srog gi rlung gis gnas brgyad dang phrad pa las dbyangs dang gsal ba'i bye brag gis sde tshan brgyad skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: The intended meaning is as follows: The life-force vƒÅyu that arises from the navel meets the eight locations, from which the eight classes arise through the distinctions of vowels and consonants.üîΩThose dissolve into the first letters of the classes, again becoming four.

original: de dag kyang sde tshan gyi yi ge dang po rnams la thim par gyur nas slar yang bzhi ru gyur nas de nyid skyes pa dang bud med dang ma ning gi dbye bas yi ge gsum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang sde tshan gyi yi ge dang po rnams la thim par gyur nas slar yang bzhi ru gyur nas de nyid skyes pa dang bud med dang ma ning gi dbye bas yi ge gsum du 'gyur ro //
translated: Those arise as the three syllables through the divisions of male, female, and nonbinary.

original: de'i phyir 'di la grub pa'i mtha' 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la grub pa'i mtha' 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the conclusion:

original: yi ge h'um las ka la sogs pa nas ma'i bar du skyes pa dang / yi ge aom las bar na gnas pa ya la sogs pa dang / yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs yi ge bcu drug skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge h'um las ka la sogs pa nas ma'i bar du skyes pa dang / yi ge aom las bar na gnas pa ya la sogs pa dang / yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs yi ge bcu drug skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The letters ka through ma arise from the letter h≈´·πÉ; the letters ya through ·π£a arise from the letter o·πÉ; and the sixteen vowels arise from the letter a.

original: dbyangs yig med pas gsal bya rnams brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: dbyangs yig med pas gsal bya rnams brjod par mi nus te /
translated: Without the vowels, the consonants cannot be expressed,

original: ke khe ghe de zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ke khe ghe de zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like ‚Äúke ke khe khe ge ge gha ge gha.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir ya la sogs pa gzung bas dbyangs yig rnams kyang 'dus so //
analyzed: de'i phyir ya la sogs pa gzung bas dbyangs yig rnams kyang 'dus so //
translated: Therefore, the vowels are also included by the mention of ya and so on.

original: de ltar na ka la sogs pa dang po brjod par rigs pa yin na ji ltar ya la sogs pa brjod de ;
analyzed: de ltar na ka la sogs pa dang po brjod par rigs pa yin na ji ltar ya la sogs pa brjod de ;
translated: Thus, it is proper to mention the first of the consonants, ka and so on, so why mention ya and so on?

original: go rims 'dor ba'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: go rims 'dor ba'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no reason to abandon the sequence.

original: smras pa ya la sogs pa'i rgyud yod de las kyi rab 'byams gtso bo yin pas na gong du gsungs so //
analyzed: smras pa ya la sogs pa'i rgyud yod de las kyi rab 'byams gtso bo yin pas na gong du gsungs so //
translated: It is said that there is a lineage of ya and so on, and since it is the main source of the extensive rites, it is mentioned first.

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang /üîΩya yi don gyis ci yang rung //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang / ya yi don gyis ci yang rung //
translated: In the treatise it says:üîΩBy the meaning of ya, anything

original: dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba ni //
analyzed: dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba ni //
translated: is to be done by one who desires power.

original: ra la sogs pa gsum gyis ni //
analyzed: ra la sogs pa gsum gyis ni //
translated: By the three, ra and so on,

original: 'gro ba'i bya ba rab tu 'jug / zhe'o /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bya ba rab tu 'jug / zhe'o /
translated: the action of going is engaged.

original: gzhan dag na re dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud chen po'i yan lag gi yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyis rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sum cu rtsa gnyis yod de /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud chen po'i yan lag gi yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyis rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sum cu rtsa gnyis yod de /
translated: Others say that there are thirty-two branches of the great yoga tantra of glorious Guhyasamaja, and by the number of thirty-two letters, there are thirty-two great yoga tantras.

original: de rnams kyang ka la sogs pa'i gsal bya'i mtha' @84a * //
analyzed: de rnams kyang ka la sogs pa'i gsal bya'i mtha' @84a * //
translated: Those are the end of the consonants beginning with ka and so on.

original: can no // 'di lta ste /
analyzed: can no // 'di lta ste /
translated: Thus.

original: dzny'a na badzra sa mu nydza ya ni ya'i mtha' can no //üîΩbadzra dha ra rgyud ni ra'i mtha' can no //üîΩbadzra ma la rgyud ni la'i mtha' can no //
analyzed: dzny'a na badzra sa mu nydza ya ni ya'i mtha' can no // badzra dha ra rgyud ni ra'i mtha' can no // badzra ma la rgyud ni la'i mtha' can no //
translated: J√±ƒÅnavajrasamujjvalƒÅniyeüîΩVajradharaüîΩVajramƒÅlƒÅ

original: badzra gra ha rgyud ni ha'i mtha' can no //
analyzed: badzra gra ha rgyud ni ha'i mtha' can no //
translated: Vajragraha

original: de ltar gsal bya'i mtha' can rgyud gzhan rnams kyang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gsal bya'i mtha' can rgyud gzhan rnams kyang shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand the other tantras that end with the term ‚Äútantra.‚Äù

original: de rnams kyi yi ge gsum po rjod par byed pa dpal gsang ba 'dus pa kho na rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi yi ge gsum po rjod par byed pa dpal gsang ba 'dus pa kho na rtsa ba'o //
translated: The three syllables of those are the root of the glorious GuhyasamƒÅja itself, which expresses them.

original: de yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams kyi rtsa ba gcig pur ma zad kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi yang rtsa bar 'gyur zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rnams kyi rtsa ba gcig pur ma zad kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi yang rtsa bar 'gyur zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, it is not only the root of the yoga tantras, but it is also the root of the twelve branches of excellent speech. In order to demonstrate this, it says:

original: thub pa chen po'i chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: thub pa chen po'i chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: The aggregates of Dharma of the great sage, and so on.

original: thub pa chen po ni sh'akya seng ge'i 'o //
analyzed: thub pa chen po ni sh'akya seng ge'i 'o //
translated: The great sage is the lion of the ≈öƒÅkyas.

original: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de de dag thams cad kyi dpal gsang ba 'dus pa snod yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de de dag thams cad kyi dpal gsang ba 'dus pa snod yin te /
translated: There are eighty-four thousand heaps of doctrine, and all of them are the vessel of the glorious Guhyasamaja.

original: de kho na nyid kyi rin po che'i za ma tog go //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi rin po che'i za ma tog go //
translated: It is the jeweled casket of reality.

original: de la gnas pa'am de nyid las 'byung ngo zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de la gnas pa'am de nyid las 'byung ngo zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: It is to be understood that the one who abides in it or arises from it is the one who is the vessel of the Guhyasamaja.

original: de bas 'di ni rgyud kyi rtse //
analyzed: de bas 'di ni rgyud kyi rtse //
translated: Therefore, this is the peak of tantras.

original: zhes bya ba ni de nyid rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rnams kyi gtsug phud yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de nyid rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rnams kyi gtsug phud yin no //
translated: This is the crest-ornament of the great yoga tantras.

original: dgongs pa 'di yin te lus dang ngag dang yid dag par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab gsungs pa de nyid rgyud 'di ru mdor bsdus shing thabs bde bas bstan to //
analyzed: dgongs pa 'di yin te lus dang ngag dang yid dag par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab gsungs pa de nyid rgyud 'di ru mdor bsdus shing thabs bde bas bstan to //
translated: The intention is this: The Bhagavat's scriptures were taught in order to purify body, speech, and mind. They are all condensed in this tantra and taught in a simple and easy way.

original: yang na yi ge gsum po kho na las sngags kyi sde thams cad dang lus la sogs pa'i bya ba yang 'byung ngo zhes de la ltos pas dpal gsang ba 'dus pa kho na rgyud kyi rtse mo yin te /
analyzed: yang na yi ge gsum po kho na las sngags kyi sde thams cad dang lus la sogs pa'i bya ba yang 'byung ngo zhes de la ltos pas dpal gsang ba 'dus pa kho na rgyud kyi rtse mo yin te /
translated: Or else, all the classes of mantra and the activities of body, speech, and mind arise from the three syllables alone. Since they depend on that, the glorious Guhyasamaja is the peak of tantras.

original: chos kyi phung po'i tshad ni gro ga rim pa gcig pa dang shing ta la'i 'dab ma rnams su phag ze'i rtse mos bris pa'i tshod kyi yi ge rnams kyis gang bar byas te gang bar byas pa'i gro ga'i khur ji srid glang rgod kyis theg pa de
analyzed: chos kyi phung po'i tshad ni gro ga rim pa gcig pa dang shing ta la'i 'dab ma rnams su phag ze'i rtse mos bris pa'i tshod kyi yi ge rnams kyis gang bar byas te gang bar byas pa'i gro ga'i khur ji srid glang rgod kyis theg pa de
translated: The measure of the aggregates of the Dharma is the number of letters written with the tip of a pig's hair on a single layer of birch bark or on palm leaves, filling up as many loads of birch bark as can be carried by a strong bull.

original: ni chos kyi phung po gcig go //
analyzed: ni chos kyi phung po gcig go //
translated: That is one aggregate of the Dharma.

original: de'i grangs kyis brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //
analyzed: de'i grangs kyis brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo //
translated: By that measure there are eighty-four thousand.

original: de ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni nye bar mtshon pa yin te /
translated: That is an approximation.

original: nyan thos kyi sde snod ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sde snod ni chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yin no //
translated: The scriptural collections of the ≈õrƒÅvakas are eighty-four thousand aggregates of the Dharma.

original: theg pa chen po la dgu khri'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po la dgu khri'o //
translated: In the MahƒÅyƒÅna there are ninety thousand.

original: sngags kyi theg pa la stong phrag brgya yin no //
analyzed: sngags kyi theg pa la stong phrag brgya yin no //
translated: In the Mantra Vehicle there are one hundred thousand.

original: da ni don zab pa yin pa'i phyir nyan pa pos rgyud 'di rtogs par dka' ba nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni don zab pa yin pa'i phyir nyan pa pos rgyud 'di rtogs par dka' ba nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach that this tantra is difficult to understand by the listener because of its profound meaning,

original: gzhung nyung ba la don mang ba zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gzhung nyung ba la don mang ba zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: it is said that in a few words there is much meaning.

original: rim pa gnyis @84b yongs su rdzogs par ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis @84b yongs su rdzogs par ston par byed pa'o //
translated: It teaches the two stages in their entirety.

original: rgyud 'di gzhung nyung ba yin pas mdor bsdus pa'i blo can gyi nyan pa po la phan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'di gzhung nyung ba yin pas mdor bsdus pa'i blo can gyi nyan pa po la phan pa'o //
translated: This tantra is beneficial for those of concise intellect who listen to it, because its text is brief.

original: de lta yin na rjod par byed pa'i nyung bas brjod par bya ba yang nyung bas blang bar bya bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin na rjod par byed pa'i nyung bas brjod par bya ba yang nyung bas blang bar bya bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then because the expression is brief, the expressed is also brief, so it would not be worth adopting.

original: don mang ba zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: don mang ba zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúIt has a great meaning.‚Äù

original: rim pa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par ston par byed pa'o //
translated: It teaches the two stages in their entirety.

original: dgongs pa 'di yin te bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa ma lus pa dang / chos kyi phung po ma lus pa'i don gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'dir me long la zhugs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rigs pas nang du 'dus pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa 'di yin te bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa ma lus pa dang / chos kyi phung po ma lus pa'i don gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'dir me long la zhugs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rigs pas nang du 'dus pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The idea is that all the meanings of all the action tantras and so forth, and all the Dharma aggregates, are included here by the principle of the reflection in a mirror.

original: 'dus pa'i rgyud ni rnyed dka' zhing //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i rgyud ni rnyed dka' zhing //
translated: The Guhyasamaja Tantra is difficult to find.

original: zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: zhes bya ba las /
translated: It says:

original: sngon du bshad pa'i rgyud rnams kyi nang nas rnyed par dka' ba ste /
analyzed: sngon du bshad pa'i rgyud rnams kyi nang nas rnyed par dka' ba ste /
translated: It is difficult to find among the tantras explained previously.

original: rtogs par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs par dka' ba'o //
translated: difficult to understand.

original: thams cad du ni dus thams cad du'o //
analyzed: thams cad du ni dus thams cad du'o //
translated: Everywhere means at all times.

original: rnam par 'khor ba ni nyan pa po rmongs shing go bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam par 'khor ba ni nyan pa po rmongs shing go bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Wandering means that the listener is confused and does not understand.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyan bdun rtogs par dka' bas na //üîΩzhes smos te /
analyzed: rgyan bdun rtogs par dka' bas na // zhes smos te /
translated: Because the ornaments are difficult to understand.

original: rgyan rnams dka' bas yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyan rnams dka' bas yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The ornaments are difficult to understand because they are not fully known.

original: sbyor ba ni 'dus pa zhes chos can no //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni 'dus pa zhes chos can no //
translated: The application is the assembly, the subject.

original: rnam par 'khor ba zhes bsgrub bya'i chos so //
analyzed: rnam par 'khor ba zhes bsgrub bya'i chos so //
translated: Wandering is the predicate.

original: rgyan bdun rtogs par dka' bas na zhes gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: rgyan bdun rtogs par dka' bas na zhes gtan tshigs so //
translated: Because the ornaments are difficult to understand is the reason.

original: rgyud kyis brjod par bya ba rgyan rnams dgongs pa dang bcas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyud kyis brjod par bya ba rgyan rnams dgongs pa dang bcas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the ornaments that are to be expressed by the tantra together with their intention,

original: de bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: therefore, etc. is stated.

original: rgyan rtogs par dka' ba can yin pas gang gi phyir 'dus pa la mkho ba de'i phyir mkho bas so //
analyzed: rgyan rtogs par dka' ba can yin pas gang gi phyir 'dus pa la mkho ba de'i phyir mkho bas so //
translated: Because the ornaments are difficult to understand, they are necessary for the assembly. Therefore, they are necessary.

original: de yi rnam par dbye bar bya //üîΩzhes smos te /
analyzed: de yi rnam par dbye bar bya //üîΩzhes smos te /
translated: One should analyze them.

original: rgyan de rnams phye nas bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyan de rnams phye nas bshad par bya'o //
translated: Those ornaments will be opened up and explained.

original: thos pa mang ba nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: thos pa mang ba nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the quality of being learned, he says:

original: 'bad de rnam par shes nas ni //üîΩzhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'bad de rnam par shes nas ni // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Having understood with effort,üîΩOne should teach the Dharma to others.

original: chos mang du thos pa la brtson pas dngos su phyin ci ma log par shes nas so //
analyzed: chos mang du thos pa la brtson pas dngos su phyin ci ma log par shes nas so //
translated: One should teach the Dharma to others after having understood it oneself without error through being diligent in learning the Dharma extensively.

original: rang bzo dgag par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rang bzo dgag par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to prevent personal fabrication, he says:

original: de bas bla ma'i bka' drin gyis //
analyzed: de bas bla ma'i bka' drin gyis //
translated: Therefore, through the kindness of the guru,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: One should teach the Dharma to others.

original: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhabs kyi padma'i bka' drin las so //
analyzed: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhabs kyi padma'i bka' drin las so //
translated: Through the kindness of the lotus feet of the noble NƒÅgƒÅrjuna.

original: ci'i don du zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i don du zhe na /
translated: For what purpose?

original: sems can rjes bzung 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: sems can rjes bzung 'dod pa yis //
translated: For the sake of caring for sentient beings.

original: zhes smos te sgra ji bzhin pa'i don tsam bzung bas blo rnam par 'khor ba rnams la yang dag par gyur pa'i de kho na nyid kyi don rab tu bstan par 'dod pas so//
analyzed: zhes smos te sgra ji bzhin pa'i don tsam bzung bas blo rnam par 'khor ba rnams la yang dag par gyur pa'i de kho na nyid kyi don rab tu bstan par 'dod pas so//
translated: One should teach the Dharma to others for the sake of caring for sentient beings, desiring to teach the meaning of reality to those whose minds are confused by merely grasping the literal meaning.

original: @85a * // rgyan de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: @85a * // rgyan de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are those ornaments?

original: brgyan pa ni rgyan te dngos po sgrub par byed par gyur pa'am /
analyzed: brgyan pa ni rgyan te dngos po sgrub par byed par gyur pa'am /
translated: An ornament is that which adorns, which serves as the means of accomplishing a thing.

original: yang na 'dis brgyan par byed pas na rgyan zhes byed pa sgrub par byed pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: yang na 'dis brgyan par byed pas na rgyan zhes byed pa sgrub par byed pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: Or is it an ornament because it adorns?

original: gal te dngos po sgrub par byed pa yin na de'i tshe dngos po ni bya ba tsam du gtso bo yin pas brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa las de tha mi dad pa yin pas sgra dang don rgyan nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te dngos po sgrub par byed pa yin na de'i tshe dngos po ni bya ba tsam du gtso bo yin pas brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa las de tha mi dad pa yin pas sgra dang don rgyan nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is an entity that is established, then since the entity is primarily just an action, it is not different from the expressed and the expresser, and therefore it follows that the sound and meaning are ornaments.

original: rgyan ni tha dad pa yin te ldum bu la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyan ni tha dad pa yin te ldum bu la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: An ornament is different, like a garland and so on.

original: gal te byed pa sgrub par byed pa yin na de'i tshe sgra dang don ma gtogs par rgyan nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te byed pa sgrub par byed pa yin na de'i tshe sgra dang don ma gtogs par rgyan nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is an activity that is established, then apart from the sound and meaning, there would be an ornament.

original: rjod pa dang brjod par bya ba las gzhan pa rgyan ni ma mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: rjod pa dang brjod par bya ba las gzhan pa rgyan ni ma mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: We do not see an ornament that is different from the expressed and the expresser.

original: smras pa 'dis brgyan pas na rgyan zhes bya ba ni byed pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: smras pa 'dis brgyan pas na rgyan zhes bya ba ni byed pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: We say that it is an ornament because it adorns. It is an activity that is established.

original: gal te tha dad pa ni mi dmigs zhes bshad ce na /
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa ni mi dmigs zhes bshad ce na /
translated: If you say that a difference is not observed,

original: smras pa / 'dir sgra ni nus pa du mas khyab pa'i rang bzhin can gyis don du ma la ston par byed pa'i nus pa yod de /
analyzed: smras pa / 'dir sgra ni nus pa du mas khyab pa'i rang bzhin can gyis don du ma la ston par byed pa'i nus pa yod de /
translated: Objection: Here, sound has the nature of being pervaded by many potencies, and it has the potency to indicate many objects.

original: don yang de dang de dag sel ba ston pa'i sgo nas nus pa du ma can no //
analyzed: don yang de dang de dag sel ba ston pa'i sgo nas nus pa du ma can no //
translated: And the object also has many potencies in the sense that it is indicated by the exclusion of that and that.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: sgra'i don gnyis yod de /
analyzed: sgra'i don gnyis yod de /
translated: there are two meanings of the word:

original: brjod par bya ba dang / gsal bar bya ba dag go //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang / gsal bar bya ba dag go //
translated: that which is expressed and that which is clarified.

original: de la brjod par bya ba ni bum pa'i 'og rgyas pa dang lto ba'i rnam pa can tshig gi don to //
analyzed: de la brjod par bya ba ni bum pa'i 'og rgyas pa dang lto ba'i rnam pa can tshig gi don to //
translated: Among them, the expressed meaning is the meaning of the word, such as the bulbous thing with a round belly that is the object of expression.

original: gsal bar bya ba ni brjod par bya ba las tha mi dad kyang de lta bu'i sna tshogs kyi sgra'i sbyor bas mtshon par bya ste /
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba ni brjod par bya ba las tha mi dad kyang de lta bu'i sna tshogs kyi sgra'i sbyor bas mtshon par bya ste /
translated: The clarified meaning is not different from the expressed meaning, but it is indicated by the application of such a variety of words.

original: dper na go dang wa ri'i yul du chu bo'i 'gram na gnas pa'i seng ges khyi de bsad do zhes /
analyzed: dper na go dang wa ri'i yul du chu bo'i 'gram na gnas pa'i seng ges khyi de bsad do zhes /
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúThe lion living on the bank of the river in the land of Gau·∏ça and VƒÅrƒÅ·πáasƒ´ killed the dog.‚Äù

original: kye dge slong bde bar song shig ces pa bzhin no //
analyzed: kye dge slong bde bar song shig ces pa bzhin no //
translated: Or, ‚ÄúHey, monk, go in happiness.‚Äù

original: de la song shig ces sgra'i don 'gro ba gtso bo ste /
analyzed: de la song shig ces sgra'i don 'gro ba gtso bo ste /
translated: In that case, the meaning of the word ‚Äúgo‚Äù is the primary action of going.

original: 'gro pa bkag pa ni gsal bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'gro pa bkag pa ni gsal bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The negation of going is what is to be elucidated.

original: de bzhin du yang byed pa sgrub pa'i phyogs su tha mi dad pa yang brjod par bya ba ni gsal bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang byed pa sgrub pa'i phyogs su tha mi dad pa yang brjod par bya ba ni gsal bar bya ba yin te /
translated: Similarly, the nondifference of the agent and the action is to be elucidated in the context of the establishment of the agent.

original: rab tu grags pa'i yan lag la gnas pa'i mdzes pa nyid bud med dam skyes bu'i tha mi dad pa ltar ro //
analyzed: rab tu grags pa'i yan lag la gnas pa'i mdzes pa nyid bud med dam skyes bu'i tha mi dad pa ltar ro //
translated: For example, the beauty of a woman or a man consists in the possession of wellknown limbs.

original: de'i dbye ba sgra dang don la sogs pa'i bye brag gis 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i dbye ba sgra dang don la sogs pa'i bye brag gis 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Its divisions will be explained later in terms of the distinctions of sound, meaning, and so on.

original: mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bstan pa dang yongs su brtag pa zhes 'grel pa byed pa po rnams kyi lugs so //
analyzed: mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bstan pa dang yongs su brtag pa zhes 'grel pa byed pa po rnams kyi lugs so //
translated: The systems of the commentators are the concise explanation, the extensive explanation, and the investigation.

original: dang po mdor bstan pa yin te de yang grangs sngon du 'gro bar bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: dang po mdor bstan pa yin te de yang grangs sngon du 'gro bar bstan par bya'o //
translated: The first is the concise explanation, which should be taught with enumeration coming first.

original: grangs ma bstan pas kyang mdor @85b bstan pa ma nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grangs ma bstan pas kyang mdor @85b bstan pa ma nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the number is not taught, the concise explanation will not be ascertained.

original: rgyas par bstan pa de lta bus brjod pas ni bstan bcos mkhan du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyas par bstan pa de lta bus brjod pas ni bstan bcos mkhan du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the extensive explanation is taught in that way, one will not become a scholar of the treatise.

original: gleng bslang ba'i grangs ni lnga zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: gleng bslang ba'i grangs ni lnga zhes bya ba la //
translated: The number of the topics is five.

original: rnal mos bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rnal mos bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the natural state,

original: sems dpa' gleng bslang pa ru bshad //
analyzed: sems dpa' gleng bslang pa ru bshad //
translated: the topics are explained as the introduction of the bodhicitta.üîΩThis is stated in the Ornament of the MahƒÅyƒÅna S≈´tras:üîΩThe introduction of the bodhicittaüîΩis explained as the introduction.

original: ces 'byung ba las bstan bcos rtsom pa'i dus su rjod par byed pa la sogs pa ji lta bu yin zhes dpyod pa'o //üîΩde la rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: ces 'byung ba las bstan bcos rtsom pa'i dus su rjod par byed pa la sogs pa ji lta bu yin zhes dpyod pa'o // de la rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: The time of composing the treatise is analyzed as follows: What is the speaker, and so on?

original: de'i rjes la de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa'i phyer dang nang gi bye brag gis tshad ma nye bar ston pa'i mtshan nyid can rigs pa ste rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir phyin ci ma log pa'i phyer dang nang gi bye brag gis tshad ma nye bar ston pa'i mtshan nyid can rigs pa ste rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: After that, in order to teach that, there are four topics: the definition of reasoning, which is the means of valid knowledge, in terms of non-error and internal divisions;

original: de'i rjes la sgra don rgyan gyi dbye bas rgyas bshad mtha' ni rnam pa drug go //
analyzed: de'i rjes la sgra don rgyan gyi dbye bas rgyas bshad mtha' ni rnam pa drug go //
translated: after that, the extensive explanation of the meaning of the words and the divisions of the ornaments has six topics;

original: de nas de'i yan lag kho na rim pa gnyis gtsor gyur pa'i bshad pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: de nas de'i yan lag kho na rim pa gnyis gtsor gyur pa'i bshad pa ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
translated: then, the explanation that is primarily the two stages, which are its branches, has four topics;

original: 'chad pa'i rgyan lnga pa ste rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: 'chad pa'i rgyan lnga pa ste rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: the five ornaments of explanation have two topics;

original: nyan pa po'i rgyan drug pa ste rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: nyan pa po'i rgyan drug pa ste rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: the six ornaments of the listener have five topics.

original: bdun pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba la brjod par bya ba'i don ma lus pa bsdus pa'i rgyan yin te rim pa gnyis gtsor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdun pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba la brjod par bya ba'i don ma lus pa bsdus pa'i rgyan yin te rim pa gnyis gtsor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is an ornament that includes all the topics to be expressed, because it is primarily the two stages.

original: de las gzhan pa rgyan med de mi dgos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa rgyan med de mi dgos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Other than that, there is no ornament, because it is unnecessary.

original: mdor bsdus pa ni mdor bstan pas so //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ni mdor bstan pas so //
translated: The brief summary is by the brief explanation.

original: de'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intention of that is this:

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas dag ji srid gsum pa de dag zab pa dang rgya che ba dang / sna tshogs kyi don ston par byed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas dag ji srid gsum pa de dag zab pa dang rgya che ba dang / sna tshogs kyi don ston par byed pa'i phyir //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn Vajradhara, for as long as the three exist, teaches the profound, vast, and various meanings,

original: rgyan du ma dang ldan pa yin pas mdor bsdus pa ni 'dir bdun gzung bar byas so //
analyzed: rgyan du ma dang ldan pa yin pas mdor bsdus pa ni 'dir bdun gzung bar byas so //
translated: and because he possesses many ornaments, the brief summary is taken here as seven.

original: rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to explain extensively,üîΩfollowing the explanatory tantra,

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: dgongs ba lung bstan pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba 'dis rang bzor bkag pa bstan to //üîΩrgyan ni bdun po rnams kyi ni //
analyzed: dgongs ba lung bstan pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas zhes bya ba 'dis rang bzor bkag pa bstan to // rgyan ni bdun po rnams kyi ni //
translated: The phrase following the explanatory tantras such as the SandhivyƒÅkara·πáa shows that this is not a personal fabrication.

original: zhes bya ba nges par bzung ba'i drug pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba nges par bzung ba'i drug pa'o //
translated: The phrase of the seven ornaments is the sixth case, the genitive, as in of the seven ornaments.

original: rim pa bzhin du ni mdor bstan pa'i tshig gi rjes su 'brang bas so //
analyzed: rim pa bzhin du ni mdor bstan pa'i tshig gi rjes su 'brang bas so //
translated: The phrase in order means in accordance with the words of the brief introduction.

original: re re yi ni gleng bslangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: re re yi ni gleng bslangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The phrase each of the seven ornaments refers to the introduction and so forth.

original: bstan pa dag ces pa ni kho bos 'chad do //
analyzed: bstan pa dag ces pa ni kho bos 'chad do //
translated: The phrase I will explain refers to the teaching.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //üîΩrgyud 'di'i ming ni ci zhig yin //
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir // rgyud 'di'i ming ni ci zhig yin //
translated: In order to teach that,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas dri tshig lnga bstan to //üîΩlan smras pa //üîΩrgyud kyi mtshan ni ming yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas dri tshig lnga bstan to // lan smras pa // rgyud kyi mtshan ni ming yin la /
translated: the five questions are stated, beginning with What is the name of this tantra?

original: zhes pa ni mtshan @86a * //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mtshan @86a * //
translated: The answers are stated, beginning with The name of the tantra is the title.

original: ni ming ste /
analyzed: ni ming ste /
translated: The title is the name.

original: de yang rgyud rjod par byed pa dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rgyud rjod par byed pa dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The name is the tantra, which is called Shri Guhyasamaja.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: bstan bcos dag ni thams cad kyi //
analyzed: bstan bcos dag ni thams cad kyi //
translated: All the treatises

original: las rnams gang ci 'ang rung ba yi //üîΩming med pas ni 'jig rten 'di //
analyzed: las rnams gang ci 'ang rung ba yi // ming med pas ni 'jig rten 'di //
translated: Whatever actions there areüîΩin this world,

original: long ba 'am lkugs pa 'dra bar 'gyur //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo ;
analyzed: long ba 'am lkugs pa 'dra bar 'gyur // zhes 'byung ngo ;
translated: without names they would be like the blind or mute.

original: / skye bo 'dod chags can don du //
analyzed: / skye bo 'dod chags can don du //
translated: For the sake of passionate people

original: zhes pa ni don du rgyu mtshan te rgyu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni don du rgyu mtshan te rgyu'o //
translated: means for the sake of the reason, that is, the cause.

original: gang la brten te bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gsungs so //
analyzed: gang la brten te bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gsungs so //
translated: In dependence on what did the BhagavƒÅn teach the tantras?

original: 'dod chags can zhes nye bar mtshon pa ste 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lngas dkrugs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas de rnams sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir rim pa gnyis ston par byed pa'i rgyud gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dod chags can zhes nye bar mtshon pa ste 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lngas dkrugs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs nas de rnams sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir rim pa gnyis ston par byed pa'i rgyud gsungs te /
translated: The term ‚Äúpassionate‚Äù is a synecdoche for those people who are disturbed by the five afflictions such as passion. Seeing them, in order to purify them, he taught the two stages that are the cause for teaching the tantras.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:üîΩHatred, ignorance, passion,

original: zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang // yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste //
analyzed: zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang // yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste //
translated: wish-fulfilling gem, and commitment

original: rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis //üîΩ'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis // 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrub pa'o //
translated: are the five families.üîΩThey are the means of attaining

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: both passion and liberation.

original: de ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rigs can gyi skye bo rjes su gzung bar byed pa rim pa gnyis po ni brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rigs can gyi skye bo rjes su gzung bar byed pa rim pa gnyis po ni brjod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the two stages for the sake of those who are of the nature of passion and so on are to be described.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: brjod bya med pa'i dag rnams ni //
analyzed: brjod bya med pa'i dag rnams ni //
translated: The pure ones who are without something to be expressed

original: gang phyir bya rog skad bzhin no //
analyzed: gang phyir bya rog skad bzhin no //
translated: are like the cawing of a crow.

original: de'i phyir bstan bcos brtsams dus su //üîΩbrjod bya sngon du mngon par brjod //
analyzed: de'i phyir bstan bcos brtsams dus su // brjod bya sngon du mngon par brjod //
translated: Therefore, at the time of composing the treatise,

original: ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ces 'byung ngo //
translated: the something to be expressed is first expressed.

original: brjod bya dang rjod par byed pa 'di dag gi thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'grel pa ma bshad kyang shes par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod bya dang rjod par byed pa 'di dag gi thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'grel pa ma bshad kyang shes par bya ste /
translated: Although the commentary on the characteristics of the means and the arising of the means of these something to be expressed and the expresser is not explained, it should be understood.

original: de dag gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the basis.

original: 'di yi byed po rdo rje sems //
analyzed: 'di yi byed po rdo rje sems //
translated: The agent of this is Vajrasattva.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' byed pa pa yin pas nyan pa po rnams bkur sti dang bcas par 'jug par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi phyir zur gyis 'brel pa yang bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' byed pa pa yin pas nyan pa po rnams bkur sti dang bcas par 'jug par 'gyur ba de nyid kyi phyir zur gyis 'brel pa yang bstan to //
translated: Since Vajrasattva is the agent, those who listen will engage with respect. For that very reason, the indirect connection is also taught.

original: dper na dga' ldan gyi gnas su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud gsungs pa na de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis zhus par gyur to zhes don gyi shugs kyis nyan pa po dang 'chad pa po'i 'brel pa yin no
analyzed: dper na dga' ldan gyi gnas su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud gsungs pa na de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis zhus par gyur to zhes don gyi shugs kyis nyan pa po dang 'chad pa po'i 'brel pa yin no
translated: For example, when the Bhagavat Vajrasattva taught the Guhyasamaja Tantra in the Tushita heaven, the Tathagatas requested him to teach it.

original: // gang la brten te 'chad pa pos bshad pa dang / nyan pa pos nyan pa de ni sgra dang don gyi 'brel pa rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: // gang la brten te 'chad pa pos bshad pa dang / nyan pa pos nyan pa de ni sgra dang don gyi 'brel pa rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The relationship between the teacher and the listener is understood by implication.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: gang phyir 'brel pa yod pas na //
analyzed: gang phyir 'brel pa yod pas na //
translated: Because there is a relationship,

original: nyan pa po yi 'jug 'grub pa //üîΩde phyir bstan bcos @86b thams cad kyi //üîΩsngon du 'brel pa rtogs par bya //
analyzed: nyan pa po yi 'jug 'grub pa // de phyir bstan bcos @86b thams cad kyi // sngon du 'brel pa rtogs par bya //
translated: The listener is engaged.üîΩTherefore, the relationship of

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: All treatises should be understood first.

original: tshad dag kyang ni bshad bya ste //
analyzed: tshad dag kyang ni bshad bya ste //
translated: The measure of the treatise will be explained.

original: zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i bstan bcos kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i bstan bcos kyi khyad par ro //
translated: This is the distinction of the treatise to be expressed and the expression.

original: de yang brjod bya dang rjod byed gnyis ka'i yan lag las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang brjod bya dang rjod byed gnyis ka'i yan lag las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is not other than the members of both the expressed and the expressor.üîΩA chapter, likewise, a rite,

original: le'u de bzhin cho ga dang // zhes pa ni le'u la sogs pa bzhi po ni gzhung rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: le'u de bzhin cho ga dang // zhes pa ni le'u la sogs pa bzhi po ni gzhung rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te /
translated: The four, such as a chapter, are the places of completion of the text.

original: gang gi phyir yongs su gcod cing gzhal bya gang du rdzogs par byed pa de ni le'u 'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yongs su gcod cing gzhal bya gang du rdzogs par byed pa de ni le'u 'o //
translated: Because it is completely determined and completed in any object of knowledge, that is a chapter.

original: gzhan du ni le'u bco brgyad kyi bdag nyid kyi rgyud nges par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du ni le'u bco brgyad kyi bdag nyid kyi rgyud nges par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, the tantra with an identity of eighteen chapters would not be ascertained,

original: mang nyung gi skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mang nyung gi skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the fault of too many or too few would ensue.

original: de bzhin du cho ga la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du cho ga la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, a rite, etc., should be understood.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: yongs su gcod pas le'u ste /
analyzed: yongs su gcod pas le'u ste /
translated: A chapter is by way of complete determination.

original: stong pa nyid kyi cho gar 'gyur //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi cho gar 'gyur //
translated: It is a rite of emptiness.

original: spros pa mang bas dum bu ste //üîΩsgrib pa med pas rim pa phye //
analyzed: spros pa mang bas dum bu ste // sgrib pa med pas rim pa phye //
translated: It is a section by way of many elaborations.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //üîΩgzhung nyid kyis ni grangs kyang ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo // gzhung nyid kyis ni grangs kyang ngo //
translated: It is an opening of stages by way of nonobstruction.üîΩThe number is by the text itself.

original: zhes pa la kyang gi sgra ni don gyis yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa la kyang gi sgra ni don gyis yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is by implication.

original: gang du don yang yongs su rdzogs pa de yang le'u la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang du don yang yongs su rdzogs pa de yang le'u la sogs pa yin no //
translated: And where the meaning is also complete, that is a chapter, etc.

original: dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the purpose, he says:

original: dgos pa yang ni zhes bya ba smos te de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: dgos pa yang ni zhes bya ba smos te de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The purpose is also twofold:

original: dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
analyzed: dgos pa dang / dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
translated: the purpose and the purpose of the purpose.

original: de dag rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de dag rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: They are characterized by accomplishing one's own and others' goals.

original: sgrub pa brgyad ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa gtsor gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa brgyad ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa gtsor gyur ba'o //
translated: The eight accomplishments are primarily for accomplishing one's own perfect goal.

original: sangs rgyas nyid ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: Buddhahood is for accomplishing others' perfect goal.

original: grub pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: grub pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Accomplishment is twofold:

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o ;
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o ;
translated: mundane and supramundane.

original: /'jig rten pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: /'jig rten pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: Mundane is the ritual of pacification, etc.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni phra ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni phra ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Supramundane is subtle, etc.

original: de la zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa dang rnam par sdang ba dang gsod pa dang / skrod pa dang rengs pa'o //
analyzed: de la zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa dang rnam par sdang ba dang gsod pa dang / skrod pa dang rengs pa'o //
translated: Therein, pacification, enrichment, power, summoning, destroying, killing, expelling, and paralyzing.

original: yang na 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang ral gri dang rdo rje dang ri lu dang mig sman dang rkang mgyogs te brgyad do //
analyzed: yang na 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang ral gri dang rdo rje dang ri lu dang mig sman dang rkang mgyogs te brgyad do //
translated: Or else, they are the eight: wheel, jewel, queen, minister, elephant, horse, general, and treasure.

original: phra ba la sogs pa ni gzugs phra ba dang reg pa yang ba dang khyab pa dang yang dag par thob pa nyid dang rab tu snang ba nyid dang brtan pa dang dbang du gyur pa dang 'dod dgur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phra ba la sogs pa ni gzugs phra ba dang reg pa yang ba dang khyab pa dang yang dag par thob pa nyid dang rab tu snang ba nyid dang brtan pa dang dbang du gyur pa dang 'dod dgur gyur pa'o //
translated: The subtle and so forth are the subtle form, the light touch, the pervasiveness, the perfect attainment, the illumination, the stability, the mastery, and the wish-fulfillment.üîΩOr else,

original: yang na / sku yi dbang phyug gsung @87a * //
analyzed: yang na / sku yi dbang phyug gsung @87a * //
translated: the lord of body,üîΩthe lord of speech,

original: dbang phyug / de bzhin thugs kyi dbang phyug ste //
analyzed: dbang phyug / de bzhin thugs kyi dbang phyug ste //
translated: the lord of mind,

original: rdzu 'phrul yon tan kun dbang phyug / bza' ba byed pa yon tan brgyad //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul yon tan kun dbang phyug / bza' ba byed pa yon tan brgyad //
translated: the lord of miracles, the lord of qualities, the lord of food, and the lord of action.

original: de ltar rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa gtsor gyur pa ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa gtsor gyur pa ni dgos pa'o //
translated: Thus, the perfection of one's own aim is the purpose.

original: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gtsor gyur pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gtsor gyur pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
translated: The perfection of others' aim is the purpose of the purpose.

original: dgos pa'i tshig gcig gis gnyis ka gzung ba ste /
analyzed: dgos pa'i tshig gcig gis gnyis ka gzung ba ste /
translated: Both are included in the single word purpose.

original: rgyud kyi rigs pa las /
analyzed: rgyud kyi rigs pa las /
translated: As it is said in the Tantra of Reasoning:

original: shin tu dang ba de ni khyi dang dkar po 'gro ba la yang 'jug pa bzhin no //
analyzed: shin tu dang ba de ni khyi dang dkar po 'gro ba la yang 'jug pa bzhin no //
translated: That extreme clarity is also used for a dog and a white person.

original: des na dgos pa dang de'i yang dgos pa yang dag par bsdus so //
analyzed: des na dgos pa dang de'i yang dgos pa yang dag par bsdus so //
translated: Therefore, the purpose and the purpose of that are well summarized.

original: gleng bslang ba ni 'das zin te /
analyzed: gleng bslang ba ni 'das zin te /
translated: The introduction is finished.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis nye bar sdud pa bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis nye bar sdud pa bstan to //
translated: This shows the summary.

original: gnyis pa zhes pa la sogs pa 'dis gnyis pa mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa zhes pa la sogs pa 'dis gnyis pa mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: The second, etc., shows the second brief explanation.

original: rgyud ces bya ba la sogs pa 'dis rgyas par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba la sogs pa 'dis rgyas par bstan pa'o //
translated: The tantra, etc., shows the extensive explanation.

original: mi yi skye bar 'khrungs pa ni /
analyzed: mi yi skye bar 'khrungs pa ni /
translated: Born in a human birth,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so sor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so sor bstan pa'o //
translated: etc. shows the individual explanations.

original: de la mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang mngon pa rnams kyi rigs pa nges par bstan nas slar yang sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i sgo nas ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de la mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang mngon pa rnams kyi rigs pa nges par bstan nas slar yang sngags kyi theg pa chen po'i sgo nas ston pa yin te /
translated: There, having taught the reasoning of the s≈´tras, vinaya, and abhidharma, again, it is taught from the perspective of the Great Vehicle of Mantra.

original: de la re zhig dang po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i skye bar 'khrungs par bstan te /
analyzed: de la re zhig dang po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i skye bar 'khrungs par bstan te /
translated: There, first, the BhagavƒÅn is taught to be born in a human birth.

original: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya seng ges 'gro ba gdon par bya ba'i phyir rjes su mthun pa'i mi'i skye bar 'khrungs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya seng ges 'gro ba gdon par bya ba'i phyir rjes su mthun pa'i mi'i skye bar 'khrungs so //
translated: Because the Lord Sakyamuni was born in a human womb in order to liberate beings.

original: rigs pa de nyid 'thad pa yin te mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pa de nyid 'thad pa yin te mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That very reason is tenable, because it is not contradictory.

original: gang gi phyir rigs mi mthun pa rnams la de'i lus la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rigs mi mthun pa rnams la de'i lus la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa ma yin te /
translated: Because for those of different species, his body, etc. are not the same,

original: ba lang la sogs pa dang bya rnams la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa dang bya rnams la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like cows, etc. and birds, etc.

original: de bas na mtshungs pa ni rgyud yin te /
analyzed: de bas na mtshungs pa ni rgyud yin te /
translated: Therefore, the similarity is in the continuum,

original: rgyal rigs kyi skyes bu chen po 'am bram ze'i skyes bu chen por 'khrungs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal rigs kyi skyes bu chen po 'am bram ze'i skyes bu chen por 'khrungs pa'o //
translated: whether born as a great being of the warrior caste or a great being of the priestly caste.

original: de tsam gyis don mi 'grub pas chags pa dang bral zhing dben pa la ma bsten pa'i bar du mi 'grub pas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas zhes smos te /
analyzed: de tsam gyis don mi 'grub pas chags pa dang bral zhing dben pa la ma bsten pa'i bar du mi 'grub pas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas zhes smos te /
translated: Since that alone does not accomplish the purpose, it is not accomplished without relying on freedom from attachment and solitude, so it says, from the midst of the harem.

original: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bzhugs pas mtshan phyed kyi dus btsun mo thams cad gnyid log pas dur khrod 'di nyid yin zhes mi sdug pa'i bsgom pa mngon du byas te de'i tshe mkha' la byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshogs 'dod
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bzhugs pas mtshan phyed kyi dus btsun mo thams cad gnyid log pas dur khrod 'di nyid yin zhes mi sdug pa'i bsgom pa mngon du byas te de'i tshe mkha' la byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshogs 'dod
translated: At that time, a gathering of buddhas arrived in the sky,

original: chags dang bral bdag rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang du @87b zhugs pa la bltas te /
analyzed: chags dang bral bdag rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang du @87b zhugs pa la bltas te /
translated: and the king entered the palace free from desire.üîΩSeeing the display of his body, they became disenchanted.

original: de rnams kyis sku bstan pa mthong nas skyo ba skyes par gyur pas de rnams kyi chos gos kyi mtha' bzung zhing /
analyzed: de rnams kyis sku bstan pa mthong nas skyo ba skyes par gyur pas de rnams kyi chos gos kyi mtha' bzung zhing /
translated: Holding the edges of their Dharma robes,

original: bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas gang gis bzhud pa'i lam de nyid nas nges par 'byung bar gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas gang gis bzhud pa'i lam de nyid nas nges par 'byung bar gyur to //
translated: the Blessed One definitely emerged by the very path on which the solitary buddhas had departed.

original: byung nas dgon pa dben pa la drang srong dam pa las chags bral gyi lam blangs te /
analyzed: byung nas dgon pa dben pa la drang srong dam pa las chags bral gyi lam blangs te /
translated: Having emerged, in a solitary wilderness, he took the path of separation from attachment from a holy sage.

original: ral gris dbu skra bregs te chos gos 'dzin par gyur to zhes btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas ni nges par byung ba ni gleng gzhi yin te /
analyzed: ral gris dbu skra bregs te chos gos 'dzin par gyur to zhes btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas ni nges par byung ba ni gleng gzhi yin te /
translated: He cut off his hair and beard with a sword and took up the Dharma robes.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sngon byung ba'i bcas gzhi'o //üîΩdgon par gnas pas kyang gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa skye bar gyur na /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sngon byung ba'i bcas gzhi'o // dgon par gnas pas kyang gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa skye bar gyur na /
translated: The basis of the training is the renunciation of the retinue of queens, which is the basis of the training for one who is free from attachment.üîΩIf attachment and so on arose for one who lived in the forest, then it would be pointless to leave the home life.

original: de'i tshe khyim nas 'byung ba don med par 'gyur bas de'i phyir gsum pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe khyim nas 'byung ba don med par 'gyur bas de'i phyir gsum pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the third is the basis of the training.

original: 'dul las zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dul ba las bstan pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la sogs pa nas gsungs pa'i bslab pa'i tshig gi tshogs gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis blangs so //
analyzed: 'dul las zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dul ba las bstan pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la sogs pa nas gsungs pa'i bslab pa'i tshig gi tshogs gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis blangs so //
translated: The Blessed One took up the collection of words of the precepts taught in the Vinaya, such as the vows of individual liberation.

original: des ni don mthun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bstan to //
analyzed: des ni don mthun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bstan to //
translated: This shows the means of attracting a following through sharing the teachings.

original: gzhan du na sdom pa ma blangs pas pha rol po rnams la de bstan pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na sdom pa ma blangs pas pha rol po rnams la de bstan pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be pointless to teach others if one had not taken the vows.

original: de bas na de rigs pa yin te //
analyzed: de bas na de rigs pa yin te //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that the Buddha took up the collection of words of the precepts.

original: sems can gyi don gyi yan lag gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi don gyi yan lag gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the principal limb of the benefit of sentient beings.

original: de ni nges pa'i tshig ces bya ba la sogs par gsungs pa'i sdom pa'i tshig nges par bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni nges pa'i tshig ces bya ba la sogs par gsungs pa'i sdom pa'i tshig nges par bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is called vow because it is the statement of restraint, as stated in the verse vow is the statement of restraint.

original: 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: The result is buddhahood.

original: de 'dod pas ni de thob par bya ba'i 'dun pas so //
analyzed: de 'dod pas ni de thob par bya ba'i 'dun pas so //
translated: By desiring that, by the aspiration to attain it,

original: chos spyod pa ni dka' thub kyi spyod pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang mdzad pa de ni rgyu zhes brjod bya ste /
analyzed: chos spyod pa ni dka' thub kyi spyod pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang mdzad pa de ni rgyu zhes brjod bya ste /
translated: the practice of Dharma is called the cause, which is what the Blessed One practiced, such as the practice of austerities.

original: 'bras bu thob pa la thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu thob pa la thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the means to attain the result.

original: de nyid ni rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni rigs pa yin te /
translated: That itself is the reasoning,

original: gang gi phyir lus dang ngag dang yid sdom par byed pa brtul zhugs kyi khyad par 'di byang chub 'dod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir lus dang ngag dang yid sdom par byed pa brtul zhugs kyi khyad par 'di byang chub 'dod par bya ba yin no //
translated: because this distinctive austerity, which restrains body, speech, and mind, is to be practiced by one who desires enlightenment.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar sdud ba bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar sdud ba bstan to //
translated: The summary is taught by this, etc.

original: 'dod chags chos kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dod chags chos kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the verse beginning with attachment to phenomena, etc.,

original: 'dod chags rnam par dag par byed pa'i sngags kyi bstan pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags rnam par dag par byed pa'i sngags kyi bstan pa la'o //
translated: in the teaching of the mantra that purifies passion.

original: don gsal rtogs phyir bshad par bya //
analyzed: don gsal rtogs phyir bshad par bya //
translated: In order to clarify the meaning, I will explain.

original: zhes pa ni mi slu ba'i don yongs su shes pa'i rgyu bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mi slu ba'i don yongs su shes pa'i rgyu bshad par bya'o //
translated: This means that the cause of the complete knowledge of the non-deceptive meaning should be explained.

original: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to the so-called five buddha families, etc.,

original: nyon mongs pa lnga dang khams dang dbang po dang yul @88a * //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa lnga dang khams dang dbang po dang yul @88a * //
translated: because of the purification of the five afflictions, the five elements, the five faculties, the five objects,

original: dang rnam par shes pa dang phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gzugs gcig pu yang ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs su sprul par mdzad de /
analyzed: dang rnam par shes pa dang phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gzugs gcig pu yang ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs su sprul par mdzad de /
translated: the five consciousnesses, and the five aggregates, the Blessed One, Great Vajradhara, emanated the single form, which is the nature of the five gnoses, as the five families of the Tathagatas,

original: de nyid kyis sngon du bshad pa'i nyon mongs pa la sogs pa 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyis sngon du bshad pa'i nyon mongs pa la sogs pa 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: precisely in order to stop the previously mentioned afflictions, etc.

original: de nyid rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid rigs pa yin te /
translated: That itself is reasonable,

original: gang gi phyir lha'i sku ni tha mal pa'i lus dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir lha'i sku ni tha mal pa'i lus dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the deity's body is in contradiction with the ordinary body.

original: kun rdzob kyi phyogs 'di yin gyi don dam pa ma yin par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi phyogs 'di yin gyi don dam pa ma yin par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that this is the relative side, not the ultimate,

original: rgyud ces bya ba yin par brjod ces smos so //
analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba yin par brjod ces smos so //
translated: he says, ‚Äúcalled the tantra.‚Äù

original: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: slar yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Again, etc.

original: rigs lnga po rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs su gcig tu gyur te /
analyzed: rigs lnga po rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs su gcig tu gyur te /
translated: The five families become one in the family of Great Vajradhara.

original: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa las kyi rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du phyi'i dkyil 'khor lus kyi dkyil 'khor la bsdus te bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dpa' bo gcig pu gnas pa bzhin no //üîΩrdzogs pa'i rim pa la yang gnyis pa dang / bzhi pa'i rim pa las gsungs pa'i 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa las kyi rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du phyi'i dkyil 'khor lus kyi dkyil 'khor la bsdus te bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dpa' bo gcig pu gnas pa bzhin no // rdzogs pa'i rim pa la yang gnyis pa dang / bzhi pa'i rim pa las gsungs pa'i 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'am /
translated: Moreover, in the creation stage, the outer mandala is gathered into the body mandala, up to the samadhi of supreme deeds, and abides as the single hero, the nature of great bliss.

original: zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rigs gcig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rigs gcig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Also, in the completion stage, the entry into clear light as taught in the second and fourth stages, or the samadhi of union, is the one family.

original: de nyid gleng gzhi yin par bstan pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid bskal pa'i bar du gnas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rtag pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid gleng gzhi yin par bstan pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid bskal pa'i bar du gnas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rtag pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The teaching that this is the nidana is because it is Great Vajradhara himself who abides for an eon, and because it is naturally permanent, not anything else.

original: rigs pa 'di yang yin te /
analyzed: rigs pa 'di yang yin te /
translated: This is also the reasoning.

original: dbye ba thams cad stong par nub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbye ba thams cad stong par nub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all divisions subside in emptiness.

original: rdo rje la sogs pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for vajra and so on,

original: mos pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi khams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mos pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi khams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to guide the realms of sentient beings with various interests,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga po rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan gzung bar bya bar gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga po rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan gzung bar bya bar gsungs so //
translated: the five Tathagatas are said to hold the emblems of vajra and so on.

original: de rnams kyang rnam par dag pa dang bcas par bstan te /
analyzed: de rnams kyang rnam par dag pa dang bcas par bstan te /
translated: Those are also taught along with their purities.

original: spong ba lnga dang rig pa lnga //
analyzed: spong ba lnga dang rig pa lnga //
translated: The five abandonments and the five knowledges

original: rdo rje zhes ni mngon par brjod //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes ni mngon par brjod //
translated: are expressed as the vajra and so on.

original: ji ltar padma dmar po 'di //
analyzed: ji ltar padma dmar po 'di //
translated: Just as this red lotus

original: gnas kyi skyon gyis mgos pa //üîΩdngos po sna tshogs skyon rnams kyis //
analyzed: gnas kyi skyon gyis mgos pa // dngos po sna tshogs skyon rnams kyis //
translated: is not sullied by the faults of the abode,üîΩso the three realms are not sullied

original: ma gos de ltar khams gsum yin //
analyzed: ma gos de ltar khams gsum yin //
translated: by the faults of various things.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / de bzhin du yang rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su slob ma'i lag pa dag tu rdo rje dang dril bu byin nas /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / de bzhin du yang rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su slob ma'i lag pa dag tu rdo rje dang dril bu byin nas /
translated: And similarly, at the time of the knowledge initiation, the vajra and bell are given into the hands of the disciple.

original: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
analyzed: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
translated: The bodhicitta is the vajra,

original: shes rab dril bu zhes brjod do //üîΩzhes @88b 'byung ngo //
analyzed: shes rab dril bu zhes brjod do // zhes @88b 'byung ngo //
translated: and the wisdom is said to be the bell.

original: 'dir yang rigs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang rigs pa ste /
translated: Here, too, it is reasonable,

original: don dang rjes su ldan pa'i ming dang ldan pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dang rjes su ldan pa'i ming dang ldan pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it holds the name that is meaningful.

original: gzhan du na lcags la sogs pas 'dzin pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan du na lcags la sogs pas 'dzin pa med do //
translated: Otherwise, iron, etc., would not hold.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩnges pa'i tshig ni yin par bshad //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / nges pa'i tshig ni yin par bshad //
translated: Therefore,

original: ces smos te /
analyzed: ces smos te /
translated: it is explained to be the etymology.üîΩThe etymology is explained.

original: sgeg pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ;
analyzed: sgeg pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ;
translated: The so-called ‚Äúgrace, etc.,‚Äù

original: bde bas byang chub thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bde bas byang chub thob par 'gyur //
translated: is the attainment of awakening through bliss.

original: zhes tshig las sgeg pa la sogs pa'i gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'i spyod pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur zhes 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir spyod pa lnga ni snga ma bzhin kho na'o //
analyzed: zhes tshig las sgeg pa la sogs pa'i gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'i spyod pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur zhes 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir spyod pa lnga ni snga ma bzhin kho na'o //
translated: The five conducts are just as before, for the sake of attaining the result.üîΩGraceful, heroic, terrifying,üîΩlaughing, scolding, frightening,

original: de la / sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs rung dang ; / dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs byed dang // snying rje rngam dang zhi ba ni //
analyzed: de la / sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs rung dang ; / dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs byed dang // snying rje rngam dang zhi ba ni //
translated: compassionate, wrathful, and peaceful

original: gar gyi nyams ni dgu ru bshad //
analyzed: gar gyi nyams ni dgu ru bshad //
translated: are explained as the nine moods of dance.

original: de la sgeg pa'i spyod pa ni /
analyzed: de la sgeg pa'i spyod pa ni /
translated: Among them, the conduct of gracefulness

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa bsten pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pa bsten pa'o //
translated: is relying on the pledge seal, and so forth.

original: dpa' ba'i spyod pa ni thams cad du mi 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' ba'i spyod pa ni thams cad du mi 'jigs pa'o //
translated: The conduct of heroism is fearlessness in all situations.

original: 'jigs su rung ba'i spyod pa ni go ku da ha na bza' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'jigs su rung ba'i spyod pa ni go ku da ha na bza' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The conduct of terror is the characteristic of eating cow, dog, and elephant meat.

original: smad pa dang 'jigs par byed pa ni 'jigs su rung ba zhes bshad do //
analyzed: smad pa dang 'jigs par byed pa ni 'jigs su rung ba zhes bshad do //
translated: Scolded and frightened is explained as terrifying.

original: dgod pa'i spyod pa ni ro langs bslang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam sgeg pa'i nyams kyi bye brag go //
analyzed: dgod pa'i spyod pa ni ro langs bslang ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam sgeg pa'i nyams kyi bye brag go //
translated: The ‚Äúlaughing‚Äù activity is characterized by the raising of the zombie, etc., or by the various moods of flirtation.
