original: gsheg pa'i spyod pa ni mngon spyod la sogs pa'i las drag po'i rab 'byams byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: gsheg pa'i spyod pa ni mngon spyod la sogs pa'i las drag po'i rab 'byams byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The ‚Äúfrightening‚Äù activity is characterized by the performance of the various fierce rites such as the rite of assault.

original: 'jigs par byed pa'i spyod pa ni zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro bo'i 'khor lo spros te bgegs rnam par gnon pa dang phur bus gdab pa dang brdung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'jigs par byed pa'i spyod pa ni zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro bo'i 'khor lo spros te bgegs rnam par gnon pa dang phur bus gdab pa dang brdung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The ‚Äúterrifying‚Äù activity is characterized by the subjugation of the obstructors by the emission of the wheel of wrath through the concentration of the vajra of hatred, and by the nailing down and beating.

original: snying rje'i spyod pa ni sems can rjes su bzung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: snying rje'i spyod pa ni sems can rjes su bzung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The ‚Äúcompassionate‚Äù activity is characterized by the protection of sentient beings.

original: rngam pa'i spyod pa ni bstan pa la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lam /
analyzed: rngam pa'i spyod pa ni bstan pa la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lam /
translated: The ‚Äúangry‚Äù activity is the miracle of teaching, etc.,

original: chos 'di ru bstan pa'i dus su gzhan du yang bstan pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: chos 'di ru bstan pa'i dus su gzhan du yang bstan pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: or it is the appearance of teaching in another place at the time of teaching here.

original: 'gal ba'i sgo nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i sgo nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The ‚Äúcontradictory‚Äù activity is characterized by the performance of the aim of sentient beings by means of contradiction.

original: zhi ba'i spyod pa ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: zhi ba'i spyod pa ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The conduct of peace is the samadhi of entering into natural luminosity.

original: 'di yang rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang rigs pa yin te /
translated: This is also reasonable,

original: thabs bde bas 'dod chags can la sogs pa 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs bde bas 'dod chags can la sogs pa 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the method of happiness for taming the passionate and so forth.

original: rigs pa bstan nas gsum pa rgyan bshad pa'i rgyud las bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rigs pa bstan nas gsum pa rgyan bshad pa'i rgyud las bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having explained the reasonings, in order to explain the third ornament, the tantra to be acted upon,

original: rgyan ni gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rgyan ni gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe third ornament is called‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: mtha' drug ni mtha'i sgras bye brag bshad do /
analyzed: mtha' drug ni mtha'i sgras bye brag bshad do /
translated: The six limits are explained by the word ‚Äúlimit.‚Äù

original: des @89a * //
analyzed: des @89a * //
translated: By that,

original: bye brag drug gi bshad pa'i rim pa yin zhes bshad do //
analyzed: bye brag drug gi bshad pa'i rim pa yin zhes bshad do //
translated: the stages of explanation of the six distinctions are explained.

original: rnal 'byor rgyud tshul las bshad pa'i //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyud tshul las bshad pa'i //
translated: The explanation from the Yoga Tantra

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsungs so //
translated: is taught by the Bhagavat himself in the explanatory tantras such as the Vajravali.

original: rgyas btab don ni rab rtogs pa //
analyzed: rgyas btab don ni rab rtogs pa //
translated: Fully realizing the meaning of the seals,

original: zhes bya ba ni phyed par dka' ba'i don ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid rab tu rtogs shing bar tu gsal ba zhes tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyed par dka' ba'i don ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid rab tu rtogs shing bar tu gsal ba zhes tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning: one who has realized the reality of the difficult to penetrate meaning just as it is, and who has made it clear.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mtha' drug gi ni tshig nges shing //
analyzed: mtha' drug gi ni tshig nges shing //
translated: The words of the six parameters are ascertained.

original: zhes smos pa ni mtha' drug gis tshig rnams nges par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes smos pa ni mtha' drug gis tshig rnams nges par byed pa'o //
translated: This is said because the words are ascertained by the six parameters.

original: tshig rnams kyi don yang nges bar bya zhes smra ba yang yin te /
analyzed: tshig rnams kyi don yang nges bar bya zhes smra ba yang yin te /
translated: And it is said that the meaning of the words is also ascertained,

original: mtha' drug ni don dang sgra'i rgyan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' drug ni don dang sgra'i rgyan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the six parameters are the ornament of meaning and expression.

original: drang ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyas par bshad do //
analyzed: drang ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyas par bshad do //
translated: It is explained extensively with ‚Äústraightforward‚Äù and so on.

original: skal ngan rnams la zhes bya ba la sogs pas so sor bstan par bshad do //
analyzed: skal ngan rnams la zhes bya ba la sogs pas so sor bstan par bshad do //
translated: It is explained as a separate teaching with ‚Äúfor those of bad fortune‚Äù and so on.

original: skal ngan ni sems la g-yo sgyu yod pa dang / the tshom rgol ba la dga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skal ngan ni sems la g-yo sgyu yod pa dang / the tshom rgol ba la dga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Bad fortune is having deceit in the mind and delighting in argument out of doubt.

original: de lta bu nyan pa po gang yin pa de rnams la rgyal ba ste rdo rje 'chang chen pos drang ba'i don du gsungs te /
analyzed: de lta bu nyan pa po gang yin pa de rnams la rgyal ba ste rdo rje 'chang chen pos drang ba'i don du gsungs te /
translated: The Victor, that is, Great Vajradhara, has taught that to those who are such listeners, in an interpretable sense.

original: de kho na nyid kyi don las bskyed pa'i rim bcom gzhan du drangs pas na drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi don las bskyed pa'i rim bcom gzhan du drangs pas na drang ba'i don to //
translated: Since the creation stage is drawn away from the meaning of reality, it is interpretable in meaning.

original: de kho na nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ston par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not teach reality.

original: sbas te zhes pa ni don dam pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sbas te zhes pa ni don dam pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Concealed means not ultimate.

original: yang dag don ni rab ston phyir //
analyzed: yang dag don ni rab ston phyir //
translated: In order to teach the true meaning

original: zhes pa ni rtsa kun tu spyod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rtsa kun tu spyod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: means in order to teach the meaning just as it is, which is characterized by the conduct of the channels, and so forth.

original: nges pa'i don ni nges par bshad pa'i don no //
analyzed: nges pa'i don ni nges par bshad pa'i don no //
translated: The definitive meaning is the meaning of the definitive explanation.

original: gnas pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: gnas pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: The abiding is the explanation.

original: rjod par byed pa gcig gis don gnyis brjod pa la nus pa ji ltar yod ce na /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa gcig gis don gnyis brjod pa la nus pa ji ltar yod ce na /
translated: How can one expression have two meanings?

original: smras pa / sna tshogs sel ba dang ldan pa'i sgra yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: smras pa / sna tshogs sel ba dang ldan pa'i sgra yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said: because it is a sound that has the character of excluding the various.

original: dper na go'i sgra gcig pus don bcu brjod de /
analyzed: dper na go'i sgra gcig pus don bcu brjod de /
translated: For example, the single word go expresses ten meanings.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: ngag phyogs sa 'od rdo rje mda' //
analyzed: ngag phyogs sa 'od rdo rje mda' //
translated: Speech, direction, earth, light, stone,

original: phyugs mig mtho ris chu dag tu //
analyzed: phyugs mig mtho ris chu dag tu //
translated: arrow, cattle, eye, heaven, water,

original: don bcu la ni blo can gyis //üîΩgo yi sgra ni brtag par bya //
analyzed: don bcu la ni blo can gyis // go yi sgra ni brtag par bya //
translated: with regard to these ten meanings

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: the wise should understand the word go.

original: don gyi rgyan de dag yin te /
analyzed: don gyi rgyan de dag yin te /
translated: These are the ornaments of meaning,

original: sgra'i bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra'i bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no distinction of words.

original: mchog 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pa ni de kho na nyid 'dod pa'i slob ma rnams la'o //
analyzed: mchog 'dod ces bya ba la sogs pa ni de kho na nyid 'dod pa'i slob ma rnams la'o //
translated: Those who desire the supreme and so on refers to disciples who desire reality.

original: de rnams la chos kyi de nyid rab ston pa zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i @89b de kho na nyid bshad pa'o //üîΩ'gal ba'i tshig gi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: de rnams la chos kyi de nyid rab ston pa zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i @89b de kho na nyid bshad pa'o // 'gal ba'i tshig gi sbyor ba yis //
translated: To them, the teacher of the reality of phenomena is the explanation of the reality of clear light.

original: zhes pa la 'jig rten dang 'gal ba'i sgra'i sgo nas so //üîΩgsungs pa gang yin dgongs bshad de //
analyzed: zhes pa la 'jig rten dang 'gal ba'i sgra'i sgo nas so // gsungs pa gang yin dgongs bshad de //
translated: With the application of contradictory words means by means of words that contradict the world.

original: zhes pa ni dgongs pa dang bcas pa'i sgra'i sbyor ba bstan te zhes tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dgongs pa dang bcas pa'i sgra'i sbyor ba bstan te zhes tha tshig go //
translated: Whatever is said is explained with an intention means that the application of words with an intention is taught, that is the meaning.

original: 'di ni sgra yi rgyan yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni sgra yi rgyan yin te /
translated: This is the ornament of words.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i sgra gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i sgra gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because sound is the principal [means of expression].

original: dbang po dman pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: dbang po dman pa'i sems can rnams //
translated: Those sentient beings with inferior faculties, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shes rab kyi mthar thug pa med pa de bas dad pa che ba'i phyir de kho na nyid ston pa la snod du gyur pa dbang po dman pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shes rab kyi mthar thug pa med pa de bas dad pa che ba'i phyir de kho na nyid ston pa la snod du gyur pa dbang po dman pa'o //
translated: Here, those with inferior faculties are suitable vessels for teaching reality because of their great faith, since their wisdom is not ultimate.

original: rtogs phyir zhes pa ni de rnams de kho na nyid du rtogs su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs phyir zhes pa ni de rnams de kho na nyid du rtogs su 'jug pa'o //
translated: For the sake of realization means for the sake of causing them to realize reality.

original: mchog tu gsal ba yis zhes pa ni gsal zhing 'jam pa'i tshig gis ston pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gsal ba yis zhes pa ni gsal zhing 'jam pa'i tshig gis ston pa'o //
translated: With supreme clarity means teaching with clear and gentle words.

original: de nyid gsal bar ston pa ni zhes pa la rab tu grags pa'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'o //üîΩdgongs pa min pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar ston pa ni zhes pa la rab tu grags pa'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'o // dgongs pa min pas bshad pa'o //
translated: Teaching that very reality means explaining well-known reality.

original: zhes pa ni 'gal ba'i sgra med par gsungs zhes tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'gal ba'i sgra med par gsungs zhes tha tshig go //
translated: Because it is not intended meaning means it is taught without contradictory words.

original: 'di ni don gyi rgyan yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni don gyi rgyan yin te /
translated: This is an ornament of meaning,

original: don kho na brgyan par bya ba yin pas so //
analyzed: don kho na brgyan par bya ba yin pas so //
translated: because it is to be ornamented by meaning alone.

original: dkyil 'khor la sogs dang zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'dri ba dang / tshad la sogs pa'i tshig rnams la'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la sogs dang zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'dri ba dang / tshad la sogs pa'i tshig rnams la'o //
translated: The words mandala, etc. refer to the various mandalas, and the words size, etc. refer to the size of the mandala, etc.

original: de bzhin du rtog pa ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i sgom pas rnam par sdang ba la sogs pa las kyi rab 'byams ston par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtog pa ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i sgom pas rnam par sdang ba la sogs pa las kyi rab 'byams ston par byed pa la'o //
translated: Similarly, imagination refers to the teaching of the various actions such as subduing hostility, etc. by the meditation on Yamantaka, etc.

original: spyod pa ni spros bcas la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ni spros bcas la sogs pa'o //
translated: The practice refers to the elaborate practice, etc.

original: ji ltar ji ltar gsungs zhes pa ni de dang de ston par byed pa'i tshig dag la'o //üîΩdon zab min bshad gang yin pa /
analyzed: ji ltar ji ltar gsungs zhes pa ni de dang de ston par byed pa'i tshig dag la'o // don zab min bshad gang yin pa /
translated: The words just as it is said refer to the words that teach this and that.

original: zhes pa ni de kho na nyid kyi don dang bral zhing phyi'i spros pa tsam ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de kho na nyid kyi don dang bral zhing phyi'i spros pa tsam ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The words the meaning is not profound refer to the teaching of mere external elaboration, devoid of the meaning of reality.

original: de ni ji bzhin sgrar gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ji bzhin sgrar gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is just as the sound is uttered.

original: zhes pa la sgra ji ltar yod pa de dang 'dra ba'i don ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sgra ji ltar yod pa de dang 'dra ba'i don ston pa'o //
translated: The meaning is taught just as the sound exists.

original: 'di yang sgra yi rgyan yin te //
analyzed: 'di yang sgra yi rgyan yin te //
translated: This is also an ornament of sound.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
analyzed: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
translated: The sacred mandala of the mind,

original: khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya //
analyzed: khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya //
translated: The size of the seat should be twelve cubits.

original: zhes gsungs pas de las mang ba'am nyung bar me bya'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas de las mang ba'am nyung bar me bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the seat should not be larger or smaller than that.

original: de bzhin du rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag las shes par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, one should understand [the size of the seat] from the [four] investigations and [four] examinations.

original: ko ta ksha la sogs pa ni 'dir sgra gnyis te /
analyzed: ko ta ksha la sogs pa ni 'dir sgra gnyis te /
translated: Ko·π≠ak·π£a and so on are here two terms:

original: 'jig rten pa dang / bstan bcos pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / bstan bcos pa'o //
translated: mundane and ≈õƒÅstric.

original: de la 'jig rten pa ni /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten pa ni /
translated: Among them, the mundane is

original: dper na ba lang @90a * //
analyzed: dper na ba lang @90a * //
translated: for example, cow,

original: dang rta dang skyes pa dang bya dang ri dags dang glang po che dang bram ze zhes bya ba dang / bstan bcos pa ni dper na bden pa dang dkon mchog gsum dang / de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang stong pa nyid do zhe'o //
analyzed: dang rta dang skyes pa dang bya dang ri dags dang glang po che dang bram ze zhes bya ba dang / bstan bcos pa ni dper na bden pa dang dkon mchog gsum dang / de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang stong pa nyid do zhe'o //
translated: horse, man, bird, deer, elephant, and brahmin. The ≈õƒÅstric is for example, truth, three jewels, suchness, perfect end, and emptiness.

original: ko ta ksha la sogs pa ni 'jig rten pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: ko ta ksha la sogs pa ni 'jig rten pa yang ma yin la /
translated: Ko·π≠ak·π£a and so on are neither mundane nor

original: bstan bcos pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos pa yang ma yin no //
translated: ≈õƒÅstric.

original: de lta yin na ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
analyzed: de lta yin na ci'i phyir brjod ce na /
translated: If that is so, why is it mentioned?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa ni rang gis glegs bam lta ba rnams la 'khrul pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa ba dang yan lag gi rlung rnams kyi de dag brdar gsungs so ;
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa ni rang gis glegs bam lta ba rnams la 'khrul pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa ba dang yan lag gi rlung rnams kyi de dag brdar gsungs so ;
translated: The Tathagata has spoken of the root and branch winds of the Bhagavan Tathagata in order to generate error in those who read the scriptures themselves.

original: / dper na bhu su ko bzhin no //
analyzed: / dper na bhu su ko bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the bhusuku.

original: za ba dang nyal ba dang 'chag tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: za ba dang nyal ba dang 'chag tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means to eat, to sleep, and to go for a walk.

original: de ni ji bzhin min sgrar grags //
analyzed: de ni ji bzhin min sgrar grags //
translated: That is known as an incorrect term.

original: zhes pa ni don brjod pa la sgra mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni don brjod pa la sgra mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the meaning is expressed in a different language.

original: 'di yang sgra yi rgyan yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang sgra yi rgyan yin te /
translated: This is also an ornament of language,

original: brda yang sgra yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brda yang sgra yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a symbol is also a sound.

original: de lta na sgra ji bzhin pa dang drang ba'i don la bye brag gang zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na sgra ji bzhin pa dang drang ba'i don la bye brag gang zhe na /
translated: If so, what is the difference between the literal meaning and the interpretable meaning?

original: smras pa / sgra dang don gyi rgyan gyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: smras pa / sgra dang don gyi rgyan gyi dbye bas so //
translated: It is said, By the division of the ornament of sound and meaning.

original: drang ba'i don dad dgos pa ma yin pa dag gi khyad par gang zhe na /
analyzed: drang ba'i don dad dgos pa ma yin pa dag gi khyad par gang zhe na /
translated: What is the difference between the interpretable meaning and the non-essential?

original: mi gsal ba dang gsal ba'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: mi gsal ba dang gsal ba'i bye brag gis so //
translated: By the distinction of the unclear and the clear.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa dang / dgongs pas bshad pa dag gi ni //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa dang / dgongs pas bshad pa dag gi ni //
translated: The literal and the intentional

original: mi 'gal ba dang 'gal ba'i sgra'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: mi 'gal ba dang 'gal ba'i sgra'i dbye bas so //
translated: are distinguished by the division of words that are non-contradictory and contradictory.

original: nges pa'i don dang / dgongs pa ma yin pa dag gi ni //
analyzed: nges pa'i don dang / dgongs pa ma yin pa dag gi ni //
translated: The definitive and the provisional

original: dbang po rno ba dang dbang po dman pa'i gang zag gi dbye bas so //
analyzed: dbang po rno ba dang dbang po dman pa'i gang zag gi dbye bas so //
translated: are distinguished by the division of persons of sharp and dull faculties.

original: dgongs pa dang sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa dag gi ni 'gal ba dang ma grags pa dag gi sgra'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: dgongs pa dang sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa dag gi ni 'gal ba dang ma grags pa dag gi sgra'i dbye bas so //
translated: The intentional and the non-literal are distinguished by the division of words that are contradictory and non-renowned.

original: de ltar drang ba dang nges pa'i don dang dgongs pa ma yin pa ni don gyi rgyan no //
analyzed: de ltar drang ba dang nges pa'i don dang dgongs pa ma yin pa ni don gyi rgyan no //
translated: Thus, the interpretable and the definitive, and the non-intentional are the ornament of meaning.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa dang sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa ni sgra'i rgyan zhes mtha' drug gi dbye ba zhes bya ba bshad pa'i bye brag bstan to //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa dang sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa ni sgra'i rgyan zhes mtha' drug gi dbye ba zhes bya ba bshad pa'i bye brag bstan to //
translated: The intentional and the non-literal are the ornament of words. Thus, the divisions of the six limits have been taught, which are the different explanations.

original: rim pa gnyis po gcig pu ston par byed pa bshad pa'i rnam pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis po gcig pu ston par byed pa bshad pa'i rnam pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the two stages as a single teaching, the explanation of the teaching,

original: bshad pa'i dbye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: bshad pa'i dbye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe division of the explanations,‚Äù and so on.

original: yi ge don zhes bya ba la sogs pas mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge don zhes bya ba la sogs pas mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the syllables, etc.

original: dang po gcig pu kho na nyid //
analyzed: dang po gcig pu kho na nyid //
translated: The first is only one.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pas grangs sngon du 'gro bas rgyas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pas grangs sngon du 'gro bas rgyas par bshad pa'o //
translated: The enumeration is explained in detail by the words beginning withüîΩonly one.

original: kun du bsdus te rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun du bsdus te rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: It is summarized as eight kinds.

original: so sor bstan @90b par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: so sor bstan @90b par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach each one individually,üîΩhe says:

original: sgra tsam la ni rab gzhol ba //
analyzed: sgra tsam la ni rab gzhol ba //
translated: Devoted to mere sound.

original: zhes pa ni sgra tsam la mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sgra tsam la mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: This means being attached to mere sound.

original: phyi rol bstan bcos mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: phyi rol bstan bcos mkhas pa yis //
translated: Skilled in external treatises.

original: zhes pa ni rtog ge dang sgra'i bstan bcos la sogs par byed pa'i tshig dang byed pa po dang rtags dang bsdu ba la sogs la mkhas pa'o//
analyzed: zhes pa ni rtog ge dang sgra'i bstan bcos la sogs par byed pa'i tshig dang byed pa po dang rtags dang bsdu ba la sogs la mkhas pa'o//
translated: This means being skilled in the words of the agent, the reason, the collection, etc. in treatises on logic, grammar, etc.

original: de yi sgrub pa rab ston pa //
analyzed: de yi sgrub pa rab ston pa //
translated: Teaching its accomplishment.

original: zhes pa ni de dang rjes su mthun pa'i bstan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bstan pa de ni yi ge'i don te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de dang rjes su mthun pa'i bstan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bstan pa de ni yi ge'i don te /
translated: This means that the teaching of the Blessed One which is in accordance with that is the meaning of the syllables.

original: yi ge tsam gyi don brjod cing brjod par bya ba gang yang rung ba ste /
analyzed: yi ge tsam gyi don brjod cing brjod par bya ba gang yang rung ba ste /
translated: The meaning of the syllables is the expression of mere syllables, any expression.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa spangs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs gcig gi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa spangs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs gcig gi mtshan nyid do //
translated: It is the definition of one part of the creation stage that is devoid of the completion stage.

original: de bas 'di sgra'i rgyan yin te /
analyzed: de bas 'di sgra'i rgyan yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is an ornament of words,

original: sgra sna tshogs pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra sna tshogs pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is merely a variety of words.

original: spyi'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: spyi'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the general meaning,

original: mdo sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mdo sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚Äús≈´tras, etc.,‚Äù and so on.

original: mdo sde la sogs pa ni nyan thos dang mdo sde pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / dbu ma pa rnams so //
analyzed: mdo sde la sogs pa ni nyan thos dang mdo sde pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / dbu ma pa rnams so //
translated: The s≈´tras, etc., are the ≈õrƒÅvakas, SautrƒÅntikas, YogƒÅcƒÅras, and MƒÅdhyamikas.

original: gang gi tshe sngon gyi bag chags kyi 'brel pa'am /üîΩdge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pas sngags kyi theg pa chen po bstan par gyur pa de'i tshe rang gi sdom pa dang 'gal ba'i dam tshig dang sdom pa thos nas 'gyod par gyur pas gsang sngags kyi gsung la skur ba btab pa'i sdig pa me la phye
analyzed: gang gi tshe sngon gyi bag chags kyi 'brel pa'am / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pas sngags kyi theg pa chen po bstan par gyur pa de'i tshe rang gi sdom pa dang 'gal ba'i dam tshig dang sdom pa thos nas 'gyod par gyur pas gsang sngags kyi gsung la skur ba btab pa'i sdig pa me la phye
translated: When, due to the connection with previous latent propensities,üîΩor through meeting a spiritual friend, the MahƒÅyƒÅna of mantra is taught, at that time, having heard the pledges and vows that conflict with one‚Äôs own vows, one will regret it.üîΩThe sin of denigrating the speech of the secret mantra will fall like a chaff

original: ma leb bzhin du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma leb bzhin du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: into the fire.

original: de rnams kyi 'gyod pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir de dang mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'gyod pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir de dang mthun par bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gsungs so //
translated: In order to remove the regret of those, the Bhagavat taught the doctrine in accordance with that.

original: gang gis 'di ni rigs pa yin //
analyzed: gang gis 'di ni rigs pa yin //
translated: By whom this is reasonable.

original: zhes lam de nyid du zhugs shing skur ba mi 'debs so //
analyzed: zhes lam de nyid du zhugs shing skur ba mi 'debs so //
translated: Thus, having entered into that very path, one does not revile.

original: mdo sde la sogs pa la zhugs pa'i 'gyod pa zlog par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni spyi'i don gyi yan lag dang po'o //
analyzed: mdo sde la sogs pa la zhugs pa'i 'gyod pa zlog par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni spyi'i don gyi yan lag dang po'o //
translated: The characteristic of removing the regret of one who has entered into the s≈´tras, etc. is the first branch of the general meaning.

original: de bzhin du yang bskyed pa'i rim pa dang ldan pas na zhes pa ni yan lag gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang bskyed pa'i rim pa dang ldan pas na zhes pa ni yan lag gnyis pa'o //
translated: Similarly, endowed with the creation stage is the second branch.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: That also is twofold:

original: yongs su grags pa dang bstan bcos pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su grags pa dang bstan bcos pa'o //
translated: the well known and the treatise.

original: de la dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba dang las kyi rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum ston par byed pa ni yongs su grags pa'o //
analyzed: de la dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba dang las kyi rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum ston par byed pa ni yongs su grags pa'o //
translated: There, the first is the well known which teaches the three samadhis of the yoga, the mandala victory, and the karma victory.

original: byang chub kyi sems kho na las khams gsum thams cad skye ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kho na las khams gsum thams cad skye ba ste /
translated: The entire three realms are born from the mind of enlightenment alone.

original: byang chub kyi sems de yang dbang po gnyis @91a * //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems de yang dbang po gnyis @91a * //
translated: And that Thought of Enlightenment arises from the union of the two organs.

original: snyoms par zhugs pa las 'byung ngo zhes pa ni bstan bcos pa'o //
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa las 'byung ngo zhes pa ni bstan bcos pa'o //
translated: This is the treatise.

original: gnyi ga de dag kyang spyi'i don zhes bshad pa'i bye brag ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga de dag kyang spyi'i don zhes bshad pa'i bye brag ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: And those two are also a particular of the general meaning, the stage of generation.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa so sor bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa so sor bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach the stage of completion individually,

original: 'dod chags chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos ni 'dod chags kyi chos te de'i chos nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod chags chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos ni 'dod chags kyi chos te de'i chos nyid do //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe Dharma of passion, etc. ‚Äù The Dharma of passion is the reality of the Dharma of passion.

original: bzlas pa'i gnas skabs su ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bzlas pas 'dod chags la sogs gang gis 'dod chags rnam par dag par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i gnas skabs su ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bzlas pas 'dod chags la sogs gang gis 'dod chags rnam par dag par gyur pa'o //
translated: In the context of repetition, by the repetition of passion, etc., whatever passion, etc. there is, becomes purified.

original: 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
translated: This is the indication.

original: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The purification of hatred, etc. should be understood in the same way.

original: de rab tu ston pa ni sbas pa'i don gcig pa'o //
analyzed: de rab tu ston pa ni sbas pa'i don gcig pa'o //
translated: The teaching of that is the single hidden meaning.

original: de yis rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa bshad do //
analyzed: de yis rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa bshad do //
translated: He has explained the stage of vajra repetition.

original: bzlas pa'i gnas skabs su ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bzlas pas 'dod chags la sogs pa rnal 'byor bas dag par byed do //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i gnas skabs su ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bzlas pas 'dod chags la sogs pa rnal 'byor bas dag par byed do //
translated: In the context of repetition, the yogi purifies desire and so forth by the repetition of desire and so forth.üîΩThe realization of the conventional truth

original: kun rdzob bden pa rtogs pa dang // zhes pa ni myur ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam snang ba la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis skyed pa'i lha'i sku sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas mthong ba zhes bya ba 'dis bdag la byin gyis rlob pa'i rim pa sbas pa'i don gnyis pa'o
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa rtogs pa dang // zhes pa ni myur ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam snang ba la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis skyed pa'i lha'i sku sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas mthong ba zhes bya ba 'dis bdag la byin gyis rlob pa'i rim pa sbas pa'i don gnyis pa'o
translated: is the seeing of the deity‚Äôs body generated by the yoga of the quick samadhi or the yoga of light and so forth, by means of the twelve examples such as illusion. This is the second hidden meaning of the stage of self-consecration.

original: // ye shes gsum po rnam dpyad pa'i //
analyzed: // ye shes gsum po rnam dpyad pa'i //
translated: The analysis of the three intuitions

original: zhes pa ni 'dis sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'dis sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: teaches the stage of the purification of mind.

original: de ltar rdo rje bzlas pa dang sems rnam par dag pa dang rang byin gyis brlab pa ste rim pa gsum ni sbas pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje bzlas pa dang sems rnam par dag pa dang rang byin gyis brlab pa ste rim pa gsum ni sbas pa'o //
translated: Thus, vajra repetition, the purification of mind, and self-consecration, these three stages, are hidden.

original: sbas pa ni sbas pa'i mtshan nyid can rim pa gsum po gang la yod pa de ni sbas pa'o //
analyzed: sbas pa ni sbas pa'i mtshan nyid can rim pa gsum po gang la yod pa de ni sbas pa'o //
translated: The hidden is that which has the characteristic of the hidden, and the three stages that have it are the hidden.

original: rim pa tha ma gnyis po so sor ston par byed pa na mthar thug pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rim pa tha ma gnyis po so sor ston par byed pa na mthar thug pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the final two stages separately, he says:

original: 'od gsal ba la rab 'jug dang // zhes smos te /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba la rab 'jug dang // zhes smos te /
translated: and the clear light.

original: phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dag gis yang dag par thob par bya ba'i de kho na nyid bzhi pa mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dag gis yang dag par thob par bya ba'i de kho na nyid bzhi pa mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: By the stages of the seal and samadhi, one realizes the fourth reality which is to be attained.

original: des ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: des ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: zung du 'jug pa rtogs pa ste //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa rtogs pa ste //
translated: the realization of union.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the stage of union.

original: mtha' ni mur thug pa yi tshig / ces pa ni de las gzhan pa'i rim pa med pa'i @91b phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' ni mur thug pa yi tshig / ces pa ni de las gzhan pa'i rim pa med pa'i @91b phyir ro //
translated: The end is the word for the limit, because there is no other stage beyond that.

original: de ltar bshad pa rnam pa bzhis rim pa gnyis po yongs su rdzogs par bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar bshad pa rnam pa bzhis rim pa gnyis po yongs su rdzogs par bstan to //
translated: Thus, the two stages are taught as complete by these four explanations.

original: de ltar yi ge'i don ni sgra'i rgyan no //
analyzed: de ltar yi ge'i don ni sgra'i rgyan no //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the words is the ornament of sound.

original: spyi'i don dang sbas pa dang mthar thug pa'i don ni don gyi rgyan no //
analyzed: spyi'i don dang sbas pa dang mthar thug pa'i don ni don gyi rgyan no //
translated: The general meaning, the hidden meaning, and the ultimate meaning are the ornament of meaning.

original: de rnams kyis rim pa gnyis po brgyan par byed ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyis rim pa gnyis po brgyan par byed ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: These are the ornaments of the two stages.

original: gal te bshad pa rnam pa bzhi pos rim pa gnyis po bstan pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te bshad pa rnam pa bzhi pos rim pa gnyis po bstan pa yin na /
translated: If the two stages are taught by the four kinds of explanations,

original: de'i tshe sgra dang don gyi dbye bas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe sgra dang don gyi dbye bas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: then what is the point of the division into word and meaning?üîΩIt is said:

original: smras pa / nges pa med pa'i phyir mtha' drug tu gsungs te /
analyzed: smras pa / nges pa med pa'i phyir mtha' drug tu gsungs te /
translated: Because there is no certainty, the six limits are taught.

original: bshad pa rnam pa bzhi po bzhin du mtha' drug gis nges par rim pa gnyis pa bshad pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: bshad pa rnam pa bzhi po bzhin du mtha' drug gis nges par rim pa gnyis pa bshad pa ma yin te ;
translated: The two stages are not explained with certainty by the six limits, as they are by the four kinds of explanations.

original: drang ba'i don gyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa bkag nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yan lag tsam ston par byed de /
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa bkag nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yan lag tsam ston par byed de /
translated: The interpretable meaning, having refuted the completion stage, teaches just the branch of the generation stage.

original: de bas na spyi'i don las khyad par yod pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na spyi'i don las khyad par yod pa'o //
translated: Therefore, there is a difference between the general meaning and the specific meaning.

original: nges pa'i don ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ston par byed pa yang rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i rim pa ston pa la nges pa med de /
analyzed: nges pa'i don ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ston par byed pa yang rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i rim pa ston pa la nges pa med de /
translated: The definitive meaning teaches the completion stage, but there is no certainty in the teaching of the stages of vajra repetition and so forth.

original: stong pa nyid tsam mam gzhan gang ci yang rung ba des ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid tsam mam gzhan gang ci yang rung ba des ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it teaches just emptiness or something else.

original: res 'ga' zhig bstan pas kyang de'i tha snyad mi rigs so //
analyzed: res 'ga' zhig bstan pas kyang de'i tha snyad mi rigs so //
translated: Sometimes, even by teaching, that convention is not appropriate.

original: dgongs pa bshad pas kyang de kho na nyid kyi don so sor ston par byed pa snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dgongs pa bshad pas kyang de kho na nyid kyi don so sor ston par byed pa snga ma bzhin no //
translated: And by explaining the intention, the meaning of reality is taught individually, as before.

original: khyad par ni 'gal ba'i sgra rab tu sbyor bas so //
analyzed: khyad par ni 'gal ba'i sgra rab tu sbyor bas so //
translated: The difference is by the application of contradictory terms.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pa de bzhin yin no //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pa de bzhin yin no //
translated: That is not the intention.

original: sgra ji bzhin pas ni phyi'i spros pa tsam ston par byed pa'i nus pa yod kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pas ni phyi'i spros pa tsam ston par byed pa'i nus pa yod kyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: By the literal meaning, there is the ability to teach mere external elaboration, but not anything else.

original: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i yan lag yin yang sgra ji bzhin pas de bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi 'on kyang de'i mtshan nyid tsam rjod par byed pas skyon med do //
analyzed: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i yan lag yin yang sgra ji bzhin pas de bsgrub par bya ba ma yin gyi 'on kyang de'i mtshan nyid tsam rjod par byed pas skyon med do //
translated: Although the conduct of utter non-elaboration is a branch of the completion stage, it is not to be accomplished by the literal meaning, but rather by expressing its mere characteristics, so there is no fault.

original: sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa ni 'jig rten dang bstan bcos las phyir gyur pas bskyed pa'i rim pa tsam la yang ston par byed pa'i nus pa med na yang /
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa ni 'jig rten dang bstan bcos las phyir gyur pas bskyed pa'i rim pa tsam la yang ston par byed pa'i nus pa med na yang /
translated: The non-literal meaning has no ability to teach even the mere stage generated from the external world and treatises,

original: yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa lag las 'gyur te /
analyzed: yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa lag las 'gyur te /
translated: The perfection stage endowed with five branches is the work of the hand.

original: brda tsam ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brda tsam ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the mere indication of the symbol.

original: de'i phyir na mtha' drug las bshad pa rnam pa bzhi po tha dad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na mtha' drug las bshad pa rnam pa bzhi po tha dad pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, the four kinds of explanation from the six parameters are different.

original: 'chad pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis 'chad pa po'i rgyun bshad pa yin te /üîΩgal te 'chad pa pos gzhal bya ma shes nas slob ma rnams kyi bsam pa ma longs shing bshad par byed na /
analyzed: 'chad pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis 'chad pa po'i rgyun bshad pa yin te / gal te 'chad pa pos gzhal bya ma shes nas slob ma rnams kyi bsam pa ma longs shing bshad par byed na /
translated: This verse beginning with ‚Äúthe expounder‚Äù explains the expounder‚Äôs continuity.
If the expounder, not knowing the object of knowledge, does not satisfy the disciples‚Äô expectations when he explains,üîΩthen

original: tshe thams cad dkrugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe thams cad dkrugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: everything is confused.

original: slob ma'i dbye ba yongs su shes pas bshad pa sna tshogs pa byed pa la brtson pa'i 'chad pa po yod na /
analyzed: slob ma'i dbye ba yongs su shes pas bshad pa sna tshogs pa byed pa la brtson pa'i 'chad pa po yod na /
translated: If the expounder is diligent in making various explanations by knowing the various kinds of disciples,

original: thams cad mdzes par byed pas 'chad pa po'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: thams cad mdzes par byed pas 'chad pa po'i rgyan yin no //
translated: he is an ornament of the expounders because he makes everything beautiful.

original: 'dod pa ni smon pa ste srid pa'i don du lung sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni smon pa ste srid pa'i don du lung sbyar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúDesire‚Äù is aspiration, which is applied to the meaning of existence.

original: gal te 'chad pa pos bshad par 'dod pa de'i tshe dbye pa gnyis kyis nyan du gzhug pa'i phyir bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te 'chad pa pos bshad par 'dod pa de'i tshe dbye pa gnyis kyis nyan du gzhug pa'i phyir bshad par bya'o //
translated: If the expounder wishes to explain, then he should explain in order to make the two divisions understandable.

original: de la dbye ba gnyis ni tshogs pa la bshad pa dang / slob ma la bshad par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de la dbye ba gnyis ni tshogs pa la bshad pa dang / slob ma la bshad par bstan pa'o //
translated: The two divisions are shown to be the explanation for the assembly and the explanation for the disciple.

original: de la tshogs kyi nang du gsang ba'i don gab par byas la bshad pa gang yin pa de ni tshogs la bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de la tshogs kyi nang du gsang ba'i don gab par byas la bshad pa gang yin pa de ni tshogs la bshad pa'o //
translated: Therein, the explanation which is given in the assembly with the secret meaning concealed is the explanation for the assembly.

original: dbang po rno ba'i gang zag rnams la shin tu gsal ba'i de kho na nyid rab tu bstan pa ni slob ma la bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po rno ba'i gang zag rnams la shin tu gsal ba'i de kho na nyid rab tu bstan pa ni slob ma la bshad pa'o //
translated: The teaching of the very clear reality to the individuals of sharp faculties is the explanation for the disciple.

original: de la dang po rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: de la dang po rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: Therein, the first has five aspects:

original: ji bzhin sgra ni sgra'i rgyan no //
analyzed: ji bzhin sgra ni sgra'i rgyan no //
translated: The literal is the ornament of sound.

original: dgongs min ni don gyi rgyan no //üîΩdrang ba'i don ni don gyi rgyan no //
analyzed: dgongs min ni don gyi rgyan no // drang ba'i don ni don gyi rgyan no //
translated: The non-intentional is the ornament of meaning.üîΩThe interpretable meaning is the ornament of meaning.

original: yi ge'i don ni sgra'i rgyan no //
analyzed: yi ge'i don ni sgra'i rgyan no //
translated: The meaning of the syllables is the ornament of sound.

original: de ltar yi ge'i don dang sgra ji bzhin pa sgra'i rgyan dag dang / drang ba'i don dang dgongs pa ma yin pa dang / spyi'i don rnams ni don gyi rgyan te tshogs pa la bshad pa yin te bskyed pa'i rim pa tsam ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar yi ge'i don dang sgra ji bzhin pa sgra'i rgyan dag dang / drang ba'i don dang dgongs pa ma yin pa dang / spyi'i don rnams ni don gyi rgyan te tshogs pa la bshad pa yin te bskyed pa'i rim pa tsam ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the syllables and the literal rendering are the ornament of sound, and the interpretable meaning, the non-intention, and the general meaning are the ornament of meaning.

original: gal te dbang po dman pas rtogs par byed pa'i de kho na nyid gsal bar bshad pa dgongs pa ma yin no /
analyzed: gal te dbang po dman pas rtogs par byed pa'i de kho na nyid gsal bar bshad pa dgongs pa ma yin no /
translated: If the reality that is to be understood by those of lesser acumen is explained literally, it is not the intention.

original: ji ltar tshogs pa la bshad par 'gyur /üîΩsmras pa / rnam par dag pa tsam ston par byed pas sam /
analyzed: ji ltar tshogs pa la bshad par 'gyur / smras pa / rnam par dag pa tsam ston par byed pas sam /
translated: How can it be explained in the group?üîΩWe reply: There is no fault, because it teaches mere purification,

original: rigs brgya'i dbye bas lus rnam par dben pa ston pas na skyon med do //
analyzed: rigs brgya'i dbye bas lus rnam par dben pa ston pas na skyon med do //
translated: or because it teaches the emptiness of the body by means of the hundred families.

original: gal te res 'ga' zhig dgongs pa ma yin pas rim pa lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba ston par byed na de'i tshe tshogs pa la bshad pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te res 'ga' zhig dgongs pa ma yin pas rim pa lnga'i nang nas gang yang rung ba ston par byed na de'i tshe tshogs pa la bshad pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it teaches one of the five stages by means of a non-intentional hint, then it is explained in the group.

original: gang gi tshe bya mjug rings 'phur bas sbrul du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bya mjug rings 'phur bas sbrul du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When a peacock flies, it does not become a snake.

original: ji bzhin min sgra ni sgra'i rgyan no //
analyzed: ji bzhin min sgra ni sgra'i rgyan no //
translated: Non-literal language is an ornament of sound.

original: nges don ni don gyi rgyan no //
analyzed: nges don ni don gyi rgyan no //
translated: The definitive meaning is an ornament of meaning.

original: dgongs te bshad pa ni sgra'i rgyan no //
analyzed: dgongs te bshad pa ni sgra'i rgyan no //
translated: Intentional speech is an ornament of sound.

original: sbas pa dang mthar thug pa dag ni don gyi rgyan yin zhes slob ma la bshad pa dbye ba lnga ste /
analyzed: sbas pa dang mthar thug pa dag ni don gyi rgyan yin zhes slob ma la bshad pa dbye ba lnga ste /
translated: The hidden and ultimate are ornaments of meaning.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to teach the stage of completion,

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas /
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas /
translated: following the explanatory tantras,

original: zhes pa 'dis lung gi tshad ma bstan to //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis lung gi tshad ma bstan to //
translated: this shows the validity of scripture.

original: @92b de ltar mdor bsdus te 'dul bya rnams la ni gang zag rnams la rim pa gnyis la brten te sngon du bshad pa'i dbye ba bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: @92b de ltar mdor bsdus te 'dul bya rnams la ni gang zag rnams la rim pa gnyis la brten te sngon du bshad pa'i dbye ba bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus, in brief, for those to be trained, the Sugatas have taught the five divisions based on the two stages for individuals.

original: nyan pa po'i rgyan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nyan pa po'i rgyan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to show the ornaments of the listener,

original: rnam pa kun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
translated: it is said in every way, and so on.

original: 'jig rten na ni nges gyur pas //
analyzed: 'jig rten na ni nges gyur pas //
translated: In the world, it is certain,

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: it is said.

original: rigs so sor nges pa can no //
analyzed: rigs so sor nges pa can no //
translated: It is determined by the individual spiritual genes.

original: de bas na lnga yin te /
analyzed: de bas na lnga yin te /
translated: Therefore, there are five.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can gcig pur ci'i phyir ma gsungs she na /üîΩrnam pa kun tu nyan 'dod pa'i /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can gcig pur ci'i phyir ma gsungs she na / rnam pa kun tu nyan 'dod pa'i /
translated: Why is it not said that there is only one spiritual gene for the bodhisattva?üîΩBecause of the statement, ‚Äúbecause of the desire to hear all the teachings,‚Äù

original: zhes pas ni thos pa la 'jug pa btang snyoms bya bar mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pas ni thos pa la 'jug pa btang snyoms bya bar mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is not proper to be indifferent to the engagement in hearing.

original: blo yi rnam pa dpag med phyir //
analyzed: blo yi rnam pa dpag med phyir //
translated: Because of the statement, ‚Äúbecause of the immeasurable aspects of the intellect,‚Äù

original: zhes pa ni rigs so sor nges pa'i rgyu yin pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rigs so sor nges pa'i rgyu yin pas so //
translated: it is the cause of the determination of the individual spiritual genes.

original: autpala dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas mdor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: autpala dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas mdor bstan pa'o //
translated: The brief presentation is by the statement beginning with ‚Äúlotus.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin tha dad ming can de //
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad ming can de //
translated: The statement, ‚Äúthat which has a different nature and a name,‚Äù

original: zhes pa don dang ldan pa'i ming 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa don dang ldan pa'i ming 'dzin pa'o //
translated: refers to the retention of a meaningful name.

original: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin //
translated: The statement, ‚Äúit is taught by the Omniscient One,‚Äù

original: zhes pa 'dis rang bzo bkag pa'o //üîΩde ni ma lus don thos nas //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis rang bzo bkag pa'o // de ni ma lus don thos nas //
translated: refutes the fabrication of one‚Äôs own invention.

original: zhes pa ni rgyas par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rgyas par bstan pa'o //
translated: The extensive explanation is by the statement beginning with ‚Äúhaving heard the meaning of all.‚Äù

original: don ma lus pa ni gzhal bar bya ba'i dngos po slob dpon gyi zhal nas thos te /
analyzed: don ma lus pa ni gzhal bar bya ba'i dngos po slob dpon gyi zhal nas thos te /
translated: The meaning of all is the object of comprehension that is heard from the mouth of the master.

original: 'dzin pa la ni rnam par mkhas //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la ni rnam par mkhas //
translated: One is skilled in retention.

original: zhes pa ni phyin ci ma log par 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyin ci ma log par 'dzin par byed do //
translated: This shows that he holds it without error.

original: skad cig gis ni brjed gyur pa //
analyzed: skad cig gis ni brjed gyur pa //
translated: He forgets it in an instant.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: This shows that

original: de nas langs te cang mi dran pa'o //
analyzed: de nas langs te cang mi dran pa'o //
translated: he rises from it and does not remember it.

original: de bas na autpala ltar autpala te /
analyzed: de bas na autpala ltar autpala te /
translated: Therefore, he is like a blue lotus.

original: gang gi phyir mtshon gnas pa'i autpala'i dri dang kha dog yod de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mtshon gnas pa'i autpala'i dri dang kha dog yod de /
translated: Because the scent and color of a blue lotus are present when it is in the water,

original: de nas bcad ma thag tu dri med pa dang mdog yal lo //
analyzed: de nas bcad ma thag tu dri med pa dang mdog yal lo //
translated: but as soon as it is pulled out of the water, it loses its scent and fades.

original: gzung bya lhag par mang thos kyang //
analyzed: gzung bya lhag par mang thos kyang //
translated: Even though he has heard much, he has not grasped it.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis padma dkar po bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis padma dkar po bstan to //
translated: This shows that he is like a white lotus.

original: gzung bya ni chos kyi don no //
analyzed: gzung bya ni chos kyi don no //
translated: The object of grasping is the meaning of the Dharma.

original: lhag pa ni chos grogs po las khyad par du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: lhag pa ni chos grogs po las khyad par du gyur pa'o //
translated: He has heard much more than his Dharma friends.

original: de nyid mang du thos nas 'dzin cing dran pas kyang byed do //
analyzed: de nyid mang du thos nas 'dzin cing dran pas kyang byed do //
translated: He grasps it and remembers it.

original: ston pa yis ni nus med pa //
analyzed: ston pa yis ni nus med pa //
translated: He is unable to teach it.

original: zhes pa ni thos nas kyang bshad pa'i dus su phyogs dang gtan tshigs dang dpe dang bshad pa'i rgyud dang yan lag gi rgyud kyi rim pas so sor ston par mi nus pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni thos nas kyang bshad pa'i dus su phyogs dang gtan tshigs dang dpe dang bshad pa'i rgyud dang yan lag gi rgyud kyi rim pas so sor ston par mi nus pa ste /
translated: This means that, even though one has heard the tantra, one is not able to teach it individually at the time of teaching, by means of the sequence of the basic tantra and the explanatory tantras, with their directions, reasons, and examples.

original: skye bas thob pa'i shes rab med pa'i phyir dang / chos la dmigs pa las byung ba'i shes rab dman pa'i phyir zhes @93a * //
analyzed: skye bas thob pa'i shes rab med pa'i phyir dang / chos la dmigs pa las byung ba'i shes rab dman pa'i phyir zhes @93a * //
translated: This is because one lacks the wisdom that is innate, and because one's wisdom that arises from observing the Dharma is inferior.

original: dgongs so // bum pa'i ras bal zhes bya ba'i dpe yin te /
analyzed: dgongs so // bum pa'i ras bal zhes bya ba'i dpe yin te /
translated: This is the example of the cotton in the pot.

original: des na bum pa gnas pa'i ras bal gyi sa bon las /
analyzed: des na bum pa gnas pa'i ras bal gyi sa bon las /
translated: Therefore, from the seed of the cotton that is the basis of the pot,

original: myu gu la sogs pa mi 'byung do zhes tha tshig go //
analyzed: myu gu la sogs pa mi 'byung do zhes tha tshig go //
translated: the sprout and so forth do not arise.

original: 'dra ba ni padma dkar po'i gang zag kyang de dang 'dra ba yin te padma dkar po'i dri rang gi lte bar 'khor zhing phyir spro ba med do //
analyzed: 'dra ba ni padma dkar po'i gang zag kyang de dang 'dra ba yin te padma dkar po'i dri rang gi lte bar 'khor zhing phyir spro ba med do //
translated: The person who is like a white lotus is also like that. The scent of the white lotus circulates in its own center and does not radiate outward.

original: padma bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: padma bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the lotus,üîΩit is said,

original: dad dang ldan zhing snying rje shes //
analyzed: dad dang ldan zhing snying rje shes //
translated: Endowed with faith and compassion,

original: zhes pa ni yon tan thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa ni dad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni yon tan thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa ni dad pa'o //
translated: Faith is the basis of all good qualities.

original: des ni dge ba can yin bzhin du rnal 'byor ba la srung bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: des ni dge ba can yin bzhin du rnal 'byor ba la srung bar byed pa ste /
translated: By it, the yogi is protected, even though he is virtuous.

original: bden pa dang dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa rnams la mngon par dad pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa dang dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa rnams la mngon par dad pa'o //
translated: It is the clear faith in the truths, the Three Jewels, etc.

original: shes pa ni yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa ni yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
translated: Knowledge is the clear realization.

original: snying rje ni thos pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu de dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje ni thos pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu de dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Compassion is the fruit of hearing, etc.

original: thos pa blo la rgyas par gyur pa zhes pa ni slob dpon gyi zhal nas gang thos pa de nyid sems kyi rgyud du rigs pa rnam pa bzhis 'phel bar gyur pa'i dang tshul can no //
analyzed: thos pa blo la rgyas par gyur pa zhes pa ni slob dpon gyi zhal nas gang thos pa de nyid sems kyi rgyud du rigs pa rnam pa bzhis 'phel bar gyur pa'i dang tshul can no //
translated: The one who is full of hearing is the one who has increased in his mental continuum the hearing that he has received from the teacher, by means of the four kinds of reasoning.

original: de bzhin du 'chad pa'i dus su //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'chad pa'i dus su //
translated: Similarly, at the time of explaining,üîΩhe is like a cloud,

original: tshigs med 'od ma bzhin du 'dzag / ces pa ni chos thams cad gtong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshigs med 'od ma bzhin du 'dzag / ces pa ni chos thams cad gtong bar byed pa'o //
translated: he is like a raincloud, because he lets fall all the Dharmas.

original: de ni padmar bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni padmar bshad pa yin te /
translated: He is explained as being like a lotus,

original: padma'i lte bar yod pa'i zil ba rnams nyi mas kha phye ma thag tu 'thor bar byed do //
analyzed: padma'i lte bar yod pa'i zil ba rnams nyi mas kha phye ma thag tu 'thor bar byed do //
translated: The drops of water on the petals of the lotus flower are scattered by the rays of the rising sun.

original: tsandan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tsandan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to show the sandalwood,

original: thos pa nyung zhing zhes smos te /
analyzed: thos pa nyung zhing zhes smos te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúhaving little learning.

original: slob dpon gyi zhal nas thos pa mang du ma thos pa'o //üîΩgal te mkhas pa gzhan gang zhig gis skul bar byed na kye gdong bzang 'bad par gyis shig / ji srid 'dod par bdag gis khyod la thams cad bshad par bya zhes thos nas smra na bdag gis thams cad shes pas chos gzhan thos pas bdag la dgos
analyzed: slob dpon gyi zhal nas thos pa mang du ma thos pa'o // gal te mkhas pa gzhan gang zhig gis skul bar byed na kye gdong bzang 'bad par gyis shig / ji srid 'dod par bdag gis khyod la thams cad bshad par bya zhes thos nas smra na bdag gis thams cad shes pas chos gzhan thos pas bdag la dgos
translated: ‚Äù He has not heard much from the teacher‚Äôs lips.

original: pa med do zhes khros nas langs te 'gro ba ni nga rgyal ldan pa'o //
analyzed: pa med do zhes khros nas langs te 'gro ba ni nga rgyal ldan pa'o //
translated: If some other scholar should urge him, ‚ÄúHey, good face, make an effort! I will explain everything to you as much as you want,‚Äù and he should say, ‚ÄúI will understand everything. I have no need for other teachings,‚Äù and get up and leave in anger, he is proud.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: thos pa'i rjes su 'brang ba gang zhig blo ldan nyid //
analyzed: thos pa'i rjes su 'brang ba gang zhig blo ldan nyid //
translated: The one who follows the teachings is wise.

original: thob nas thos pa nyid la btang snyoms gang byed pa //
analyzed: thob nas thos pa nyid la btang snyoms gang byed pa //
translated: Having attained, he is indifferent to the teachings themselves.

original: thos pa sna tshogs rnam pa dpag med lus pa na //
analyzed: thos pa sna tshogs rnam pa dpag med lus pa na //
translated: The various teachings are left with immeasurable aspects.

original: rmongs pa de ni nges pa skye bar ga la 'gyur //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rmongs pa de ni nges pa skye bar ga la 'gyur // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: How can there be certainty for the confused?

original: gal te nga rgyal ldan pa yin na de skyon med du chug na gal te bshad pa'i dus su mang du smra ste skyo ba skyed par byed do //
analyzed: gal te nga rgyal ldan pa yin na de skyon med du chug na gal te bshad pa'i dus su mang du smra ste skyo ba skyed par byed do //
translated: If he is proud, let him be faultless. But if he speaks much at the time of teaching, he causes weariness.

original: gal te rigs pa smra na de'i tshe skyon med do //
analyzed: gal te rigs pa smra na de'i tshe skyon med do //
translated: If he speaks logically, then he is faultless.

original: 'on kyang rtsa ba med par ni mdo @93b las 'das shing bstan pa gzhan dang bsres te rang gi grub pa'i mtha' dang bral bar smra zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtsa ba med par ni mdo @93b las 'das shing bstan pa gzhan dang bsres te rang gi grub pa'i mtha' dang bral bar smra zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: But if he speaks without a basis, he goes beyond the sutras and mixes up the teachings, speaking in contradiction to his own philosophical tenets.

original: skyon de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir thos pa'i snod du rung bar gal te byas na de yang mi nus te /
analyzed: skyon de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir thos pa'i snod du rung bar gal te byas na de yang mi nus te /
translated: In order to remove that fault, if he makes himself a suitable vessel for learning, he is still unable to do so.

original: nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is proud.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: mi shes pa ni bde bar mgu bya ste //
analyzed: mi shes pa ni bde bar mgu bya ste //
translated: The ignorant are easily pleased.

original: khyad par shes pa shin tu mgu bar sla //
analyzed: khyad par shes pa shin tu mgu bar sla //
translated: The especially wise are very difficult to please.

original: dum cig shes pas khengs pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: dum cig shes pas khengs pa gang yin pa //
translated: Those who are conceited by a little knowledge

original: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mgu bar byed mi nus //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mgu bar byed mi nus //
translated: cannot be pleased even by the Buddha.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: This is the Candana hell.

original: de ni tsandan zhes bya ba ste tsandan ni rang bzhin gyis 'bras bu med pa dang mche ba'i dug can gyi sbrul rnams kyis bskor ba'i phyir de'i gam du gang gis kyang mi nye bas rjes su gzung bar mi nus so //
analyzed: de ni tsandan zhes bya ba ste tsandan ni rang bzhin gyis 'bras bu med pa dang mche ba'i dug can gyi sbrul rnams kyis bskor ba'i phyir de'i gam du gang gis kyang mi nye bas rjes su gzung bar mi nus so //
translated: Candana is surrounded by snakes with naturally fruitless fangs, and no one can approach it, so it cannot be rescued.

original: de ltar bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is devoid of the accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not accomplish one's own or others' goals.

original: rin po che bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rin po che bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach the jewel,

original: tshul khrims zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: tshul khrims zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, morality, etc.

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi rten sa gzhi bzhin du yon tan thams cad yi gzhi ni tshul khrims de dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi rten sa gzhi bzhin du yon tan thams cad yi gzhi ni tshul khrims de dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Like the earth is the basis of the moving and unmoving, morality is the basis of all virtues.

original: dag pa ni g-yo sgyu med pa'o //
analyzed: dag pa ni g-yo sgyu med pa'o //
translated: Purity means being free from deceit.

original: mkhas pa sgrin zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i las rnams la brtson zhing yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa sgrin zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i las rnams la brtson zhing yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: Skillful means being diligent in virtuous actions and fully understanding them.

original: shes rab ldan zhing zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab yod pa'i //
analyzed: shes rab ldan zhing zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab yod pa'i //
translated: Endowed with wisdom refers to the possession of innate wisdom.

original: rgyud gcig pa ni lan gcig gzhan gyis brjod pa'i gzhal bya thos nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du 'dzin cing dran pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud gcig pa ni lan gcig gzhan gyis brjod pa'i gzhal bya thos nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du 'dzin cing dran pa'o //
translated: Of one mind means that having heard the object of evaluation stated by another, one retains and remembers it for as long as one lives.

original: thos nas legs par ston pa ni //üîΩzhes pa la /
analyzed: thos nas legs par ston pa ni // zhes pa la /
translated: Having heard, one teaches well.

original: ji ltar slob dpon gyi zhal nas thos pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar slob dpon gyi zhal nas thos pa de bzhin du /
translated: As it is heard from the mouth of the master,

original: bshad pa'i rgyud la sogs pa dang bcas pa ma nor bar ston pa de ni rin po che lta bu'i gang zag ste re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang rin thang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud la sogs pa dang bcas pa ma nor bar ston pa de ni rin po che lta bu'i gang zag ste re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang rin thang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: without error, together with the explanatory tantras and so forth, one teaches. That is the person who is like a jewel, because they fulfill all hopes and are priceless.

original: yang na sngon du bshad pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs rin che ba'o //
analyzed: yang na sngon du bshad pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs rin che ba'o //
translated: Or, the collection of qualities explained previously is precious.

original: de dang ldan pa'i phyir rin po che'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i phyir rin po che'o //
translated: Because they possess that, they are a jewel.

original: gang zag de rnams rnam pa gnyis su bstan par bya ba'i phyir autpala zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: gang zag de rnams rnam pa gnyis su bstan par bya ba'i phyir autpala zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In order to teach that those persons are of two types, it says, ‚Äúlotus‚Äù and so forth.

original: gang zag bzhi pa 'di dag ni //
analyzed: gang zag bzhi pa 'di dag ni //
translated: These four persons

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
translated: and so on.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa gtsor gyur pa'i tshogs kyi bshad pa'i snod du rung ba yin gyis gzhan gyi ni ma yin zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa gtsor gyur pa'i tshogs kyi bshad pa'i snod du rung ba yin gyis gzhan gyi ni ma yin zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder of the sentence is that one is a suitable vessel for the explanation of the assembly which is primarily the stage of generation, but not for the other.

original: de lta na tsandan zhes @94a * //
analyzed: de lta na tsandan zhes @94a * //
translated: In that case, what is called sandalwood,

original: bya ba bems pa'i rigs can de ci'i phyir bshad pa'i snod du rung bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: bya ba bems pa'i rigs can de ci'i phyir bshad pa'i snod du rung bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: which is of the class of insentient things, how could it be a suitable vessel for the explanation?üîΩIt was said:

original: smras pa / rnam pa kun tu nyan 'dod pa //
analyzed: smras pa / rnam pa kun tu nyan 'dod pa //
translated: Desiring to hear in every way,

original: zhes sngon du bshad de nyan pa la 'jug pa ni btang snyoms kyi gnas ma yin pa dang / rjes su gzung bar bya ba yin pas so //
analyzed: zhes sngon du bshad de nyan pa la 'jug pa ni btang snyoms kyi gnas ma yin pa dang / rjes su gzung bar bya ba yin pas so //
translated: because engaging in listening is not a state of equanimity and is to be accepted.

original: gang gi phyir gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la ni /
translated: For this reason, in this Guhyasamaja,

original: rigs ngan dang / smyug ma mkhan la sogs pa yang snod du rung bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: rigs ngan dang / smyug ma mkhan la sogs pa yang snod du rung bar 'gyur na /
translated: even those of low caste, bamboo workers and so on, become suitable vessels.

original: chos thos pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis 'jug pa ni lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: chos thos pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis 'jug pa ni lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: What need is there to mention those who engage in the stages of listening to the dharma and so on?

original: de'i lta ba log pa tsam rim gyis bsal bar nus kyi de nyid kyi phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i snod ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i lta ba log pa tsam rim gyis bsal bar nus kyi de nyid kyi phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i snod ma yin no //
translated: One can gradually remove the mere error of his view, but for that very reason he is not a vessel for the completion stage.

original: gang gi tshe skas kyi rim pa'i rigs pas bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyin na de'i tshe tsandan lta bu yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i snod du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe skas kyi rim pa'i rigs pas bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyin na de'i tshe tsandan lta bu yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i snod du 'gyur ro //
translated: When he has completed the stage of development by the method of the steps of a ladder, then even one who is like sandalwood becomes a vessel for the completion stage.

original: des na rnam pa thams cad du de la btang snyoms bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rnam pa thams cad du de la btang snyoms bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, one should not be indifferent to him in every way.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di slob ma la bshad pa'i snod du rung ba gcig pu kho na zhes dam bca' ba'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di slob ma la bshad pa'i snod du rung ba gcig pu kho na zhes dam bca' ba'o //
translated: The statement one who is a vessel for the completion stage, etc. is a conclusion that he alone is fit to be taught as a disciple.

original: rtag tu spyod pas rnam brgyan pa ni tshul khrims la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan pa zhes khyad par gyi sgo nas gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: rtag tu spyod pas rnam brgyan pa ni tshul khrims la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan pa zhes khyad par gyi sgo nas gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason is by way of a distinction: adorned with constant practice, that is, adorned with the qualities of morality, etc.

original: da ni slob ma brtags pas bshad pa'i dbye ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir ;
analyzed: da ni slob ma brtags pas bshad pa'i dbye ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir ;
translated: Now, in order to teach the classification of the explanation by examining the disciple,

original: gang zag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gang zag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says the person, etc.

original: gang zag gang yin pa dang ji lta bu'i shes pa dang ldan pa zhes yongs su brtags te snod dang snod min zhes pa la yon tan can dang yon tan can ma yin pa shes nas /
analyzed: gang zag gang yin pa dang ji lta bu'i shes pa dang ldan pa zhes yongs su brtags te snod dang snod min zhes pa la yon tan can dang yon tan can ma yin pa shes nas /
translated: Having examined which person and with what kind of knowledge, one should know the one who is a vessel and the one who is not a vessel, the one who has good qualities and the one who does not have good qualities.

original: rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa ni //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa ni //
translated: The wise vajra masterüîΩ.

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: Here,

original: de rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag chags la sogs pa'i dbye bshes pas so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag chags la sogs pa'i dbye bshes pas so //
translated: having understood the differences in their thoughts, habitual tendencies, and so on.

original: bshad pa rnam pa gnyis bya'o //
analyzed: bshad pa rnam pa gnyis bya'o //
translated: One should explain the two kinds of explanations.

original: zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i bshad pa bya ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i bshad pa bya ba yin te /
translated: This is the explanation of the explanation that was explained above.

original: gzhan du na thams cad dkrugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na thams cad dkrugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, everything would be mixed up.

original: bstan bcos thams cad khyab par byed pa bsdu ba'i rgyan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bstan bcos thams cad khyab par byed pa bsdu ba'i rgyan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the ornament that summarizes all the treatises,

original: rgyan ni drug po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rgyan ni drug po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúThe ornament is the six,‚Äù and so on.

original: gleng gzhi la sogs pa drug gis rgyud kyi lus nges par byas pas so //
analyzed: gleng gzhi la sogs pa drug gis rgyud kyi lus nges par byas pas so //
translated: The body of the tantra is ascertained by the six, the nidƒÅna, and so on.

original: bden gnyis rnam par nges byas pa //
analyzed: bden gnyis rnam par nges byas pa //
translated: Having ascertained the two truths,

original: zhes pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sor bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the meditative concentration of the inseparability of the conventional and the ultimate, taught separately.

original: de ni rgyan 'gyur bdun pa ste //üîΩzhes pa @94b la ;
analyzed: de ni rgyan 'gyur bdun pa ste // zhes pa @94b la ;
translated: That is the seventh ornament.

original: de las gzhan pa'i rgyan mi dgos te bslab par bya ba med pas so //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i rgyan mi dgos te bslab par bya ba med pas so //
translated: There is no need for any other ornament than that, because there is nothing else to be learned.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub ba'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub ba'o //
translated: The perfection stage is the accomplishment.

original: zhes pa ni rdo rje'i sku rnam grangs can chos kyi dbyings dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar gyur pa'i tshul zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras brjod pa ste 'bras bur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdo rje'i sku rnam grangs can chos kyi dbyings dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar gyur pa'i tshul zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras brjod pa ste 'bras bur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The vajra body, which is synonymous with the sphere of phenomena, the perfection of wisdom, and the way of being, is expressed by the terms such as ‚Äúaccomplishment‚Äù because it is the result.

original: de lta na zung du 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa ni mthar thug pa'i rnam pa gnyis pa 'di yin na /
analyzed: de lta na zung du 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa ni mthar thug pa'i rnam pa gnyis pa 'di yin na /
translated: If that is so, then this is the final twofold teaching of union.

original: de ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub par byed pa'i rgyan gzhan bshad ce na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub par byed pa'i rgyan gzhan bshad ce na /
translated: Why then is another ornament taught for the accomplishment of the perfection stage?

original: de ni bden gyi rgyas par bshad pa dang mngon du byed pa dag gis bye brag yod do //
analyzed: de ni bden gyi rgyas par bshad pa dang mngon du byed pa dag gis bye brag yod do //
translated: That is true, but there is a difference in the extensive explanation and the actualization.

original: dgongs pa ni mthar thug pas ni zung du 'jug pa'i rgyas par bshad pa dang mtshan nyid ston to //
analyzed: dgongs pa ni mthar thug pas ni zung du 'jug pa'i rgyas par bshad pa dang mtshan nyid ston to //
translated: The intention is the ultimate, which is taught in the extensive explanation of the union and in the characteristics.

original: de bas na zung du 'jug pa la rtogs pa zhes bshad kyi thob pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na zung du 'jug pa la rtogs pa zhes bshad kyi thob pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the union is explained as the realization, but not as the attainment.

original: 'dir ni bstan bcos kyi don ma lus pa yongs su brtags pas gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir ni bstan bcos kyi don ma lus pa yongs su brtags pas gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gyur te /
translated: Here, the entire meaning of the treatise is examined and becomes the nondual samadhi.

original: thos pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab dag las bsgom pa'i rang bzhin khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas mngon du byed pa'i dbang gis rgyan 'di tha dad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: thos pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab dag las bsgom pa'i rang bzhin khyad par du 'phags pa yin pas mngon du byed pa'i dbang gis rgyan 'di tha dad pa kho na'o //
translated: Since the nature of the meditation is superior to the wisdoms of hearing and contemplation, this ornament is distinct by the power of actualization.
